quote: Beauty is indeed a good gift of God; but that the good may not think it a great good, God dispenses it even to the wicked.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
author: Thomas Overbury

quote: Do not try to push your way through to the front ranks of your profession do not run after distinctions and rewards but do your utmost to find an entry into the world of beauty.
author: Constantin Stanislavski

quote: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being skin deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
author: Jean Kerr

quote: Never once does 'Snow White' herself look in the mirror so she isn't aware of her beauty or what apparently that does to people. It's really just the queen and the prince that talk about it.
author: Lily Collins

quote: For me beauty is valued more than anything - the beauty that is manifest in a curved line or in an act of creativity.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Maybe you just don't see your own beauty.
author: Lena Headey

quote: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form.
author: Joan Crawford

quote: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The architect should strive continually to simplify the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: For what the horse does under compulsion, as Simon also observes, is done without understanding; and there is no beauty in it either, any more than if one should whip and spur a dancer.
author: Xenophon

quote: We were astonished by the beauty and refinement of the art displayed by the objects surpassing all we could have imagined - the impression was overwhelming.
author: Howard Carter

quote: Where is there beauty when you see deprivation and starvation?
author: Rosalind Russell

quote: At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint or even remember it. It is enough.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Women are so unforgiving of themselves. We don't recognize our own beauty because we're too busy comparing ourselves to other people.
author: Kelly Osbourne

quote: I love my beauty. It's not my fault.
author: Valentino Garavani

quote: My idea of beauty is somebody that doesn't have to try too much, someone who is effortless and fresh.
author: Jessica Ennis

quote: A lot of punk rock is not going to be in the mainstream. It's below the radar. The beauty of it is that you're not supposed to always know. It's subterranean.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: The sport of horse racing which, at its best, showcases the majestic beauty of this animal and the athleticism of jockeys, has reached an alarming level of corruption and exploitation.
author: Tom Udall

quote: My beauty icons are women whose images are self-created.
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: A beautiful bouquet or a long-lasting flowering plant is a traditional gift for women, but I have recommended that both men and women keep fresh flowers in the home for their beauty, fragrance, and the lift they give our spirits.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: Aesthetics - rather than reason - shapes our thought processes. First comes aesthetics, then logic. 'Thinking in Numbers' is not about an attempt to impress the reader but to include the reader, draw the reader in, by explaining my experiences - the beauty I feel in a prime number, for example.
author: Daniel Tammet

quote: If you see a Renaissance body, this is completely ugly in this time. Everybody has to be skinny. But the Renaissance body with incredible flow of the meat everywhere, it was beauty.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves.
author: Aimee Mullins

quote: The thing that surprised me the most is just how much money women that weren't rich were paying for their hair. When you're in a beauty parlor in Harlem next to abandoned buildings and somebody's paying five grand for a weave, that's a bit much.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I feel it is important not to get overly obsessed and overly carried away with just the physical aspect. There is more to beauty than just the physical appearance. You are also a complete person, and a woman should have an identity beyond just the way she looks.
author: Katrina Kaif

quote: Sleep is the real beauty secret, but I don't get enough of that.
author: Chelsea Leyland

quote: I purposefully try to make films in that grey area, where things are morally ambiguous. It's like life: good people do horrible things, and bad people do good things, and there's beauty in horror and horror in beauty.
author: Harmony Korine

quote: My favourite beauty look is definitely '70s beauty - sun kissed skin, wavy hair and defined eyes.
author: Erin Heatherton

quote: Hema Malini and Nutan were my childhood crushes! I met Hemaji once when dad took me to the set of a film. Both these ladies stole my heart with their beauty and grace.
author: Rohit Shetty

quote: A good poem brims with reflected beauty and even a bracing, beautiful ugliness. At the center of our lives, in the midst of the busyness and the forgetting, is a story that makes sense when everything extraneous has been taken away.
author: David Whyte

quote: The last thing left in nature is the beauty of women.
author: Peter Beard

quote: When it comes to beauty, I feel that hanging with people you love, laughing, and doing silly things gets your spirits up. We are always prettier when we are happier.
author: Sara Sampaio

quote: Every human - especially the most vulnerable, the unborn, the infirm, those ravaged by age and those desperate in despair - should be protected in law, loved, and told repeatedly of their incredible beauty and worth.
author: Sam Brownback

quote: So far as I am concerned, I could not be accused of having set eyes, or having wished to set eyes, upon Darius' wife: on the contrary, I have refused even to listen to those who spoke to me of her beauty.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Going to the Academy Awards is something I remember since I was six, when I went with my mom for the first time, 14 with my dad, you know, and there I am, at 22, 23, whatever I was, sitting next to my mom. You know, and then again, there with my dad. Like, there's a beauty to it, and I care deeply about film history.
author: Laura Dern

quote: I'm proud that today, at 43 years old, I've come to value the aging process and focus on inner rather than outer beauty.
author: Carre Otis

quote: I never in a million years thought I would be the person to go to for self-esteem; that was not my intent. But I happen to love beauty, I love the way people look, and I love making women look beautiful.
author: Bobbi Brown

quote: This is the artist, then, life's hungry man, the glutton of eternity, beauty's miser, glory's slave.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: I did flirt with the idea of going to law school, but not for long. Maybe I'll play a lawyer one day - the beauty of acting is that you can try on so many different roles without having to commit to them in real life.
author: Elizabeth Debicki

quote: Hollywood needs to recognise all shades of African American beauty.
author: Gabrielle Union

quote: People tend not to use this word beauty because it's not intellectual - but there has to be an overlap between beauty and intellect.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: I am little concerned with beauty or perfection. I don't care for the great centuries. All I care about is life, struggle, intensity.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Form follows beauty.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: I do take very good care of myself, and I'm always in love. And by that I mean I have an appetite for life. I'm in love with beauty and things and people and love and being in love, and those things I think, on the inside, show on the outside.
author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quote: You know, all these sentiments about beauty coming from within, they've always resonated when I've read them, but it takes a bit of living to truly appreciate them. To realise we are so much more than our experiences, that we are who we are because of the lessons we've learnt, now that's what true 'beauty' is for me.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: Find your own way, have an open spirit, and believe in your own beauty.
author: Francois Nars

quote: Even in the centuries which appear to us to be the most monstrous and foolish, the immortal appetite for beauty has always found satisfaction.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
author: Courtney Love

quote: I would rather be adorned by beauty of character than jewels. Jewels are the gift of fortune, while character comes from within.
author: Plautus

quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
author: Voltaire

quote: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: To give pain is the tyranny; to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
author: Max Eastman

quote: Rich men's houses are seldom beautiful, rarely comfortable, and never original. It is a constant source of surprise to people of moderate means to observe how little a big fortune contributes to Beauty.
author: Margot Asquith

quote: All I wanted was to connect my moods with those of Paris. Beauty paints and when it painted most, I shot.
author: Ernst Haas

quote: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: What I like about cities is that everything is king size, the beauty and the ugliness.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: Praise or blame has but a momentary effect on the man whose love of beauty in the abstract makes him a severe critic on his own works.
author: John Keats

quote: Great perils have this beauty, that they bring to light the fraternity of strangers.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: And beauty immortal awakes from the tomb.
author: James Beattie

quote: A sculptor wields The chisel, and the stricken marble grows To beauty.
author: William C. Bryant

quote: One of the things that people don't realize is that that natural beauty, those recreational forests, they have an economic development impact for the state as well.
author: Ed Rendell

quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
author: Petrarch

quote: Search for beauty without features, something deeper than any signs.
author: Francesca da Rimini

quote: We're here to bring beauty to the world and make a difference in this planet. That's what art forms are about.
author: Charlie Haden

quote: Shortly thereafter, some friends encouraged me to try out for the Miss South Carolina World beauty pageant. To my surprise, I won - and was sent to New York City to compete nationally.
author: Donna Rice

quote: What is sacred among one people may be ridiculous in another; and what is despised or rejected by one cultural group, may in a different environment become the cornerstone for a great edifice of strange grandeur and beauty.
author: Hu Shih

quote: Every performance is different. That's the beauty of it.
author: Van Morrison

quote: I am obsessed with beauty. I want everything to be perfect, and of course it isn't. And that's a tough place to be because you're never satisfied.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: I thought of Paris as a beauty spot on the face of the earth, and of London as a big freckle.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: I felt I had to share Idaho with my friend from New York because he'd shared New York with me, so I was going to share the beauty of nature with a man who went to museums and clubs late at night. But there was nothing to do where I lived at night.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: Beauty is the lover's gift.
author: William Congreve

quote: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.
author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quote: I do not know which to prefer, The beauty of inflections, Or the beauty of innuendoes, The blackbird whistling, Or just after.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Whether you come from heaven or hell, what does it matter, O Beauty!
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Beauty is the oracle that speaks to us all.
author: Luis Barragan

quote: A whopping 89 percent of buyers start their home search online. How your house looks online is the modern equivalent of 'curb appeal.' Rent a wide-angle lens and good lighting, get rid of your clutter and post at least eight great photos to win the beauty contest.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: Beauty doesn't matter because in the end, we all lose our looks and all we have is our heart.
author: Ann Curry

quote: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Blues and soul and jazz music has so much pain, so much beauty of raw emotion and passion.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: I didn't grow up identifying with beauty. I grew up thinking I could be smart and funny - those are the things I got feedback on.
author: Lauren Graham

quote: Abstraction brings the world into more complex, variable relations; it can extract beauty, alternative topographies, ugliness, and intense actualities from seeming nothingness.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: I think beauty comes from within, and society paints a ridiculous picture.
author: Rachel Bilson

quote: Beauty can come in strange forms.
author: James Dyson

quote: We have to get back to the beauty of just being alive in this present moment.
author: Mary McDonnell

quote: Life is one long decay, no? There's a lot of beauty in it. Like the patina in an old city.
author: Urs Fischer

quote: My dream is that people will find a way back home, into their bodies, to connect with the earth, to connect with each other, to connect with the poor, to connect with the broken, to connect with the needy, to connect with people calling out all around us, to connect with the beauty, poetry, the wildness.
author: Eve Ensler

quote: To me, 'beauty' means to be natural, creative, honest - to say the truth.
author: Nawal El Saadawi

quote: I believe love at first sight is possible. Centuries of literature and art and beauty has been dedicated to that idea, so who am I to argue, even if I've never experienced it?
author: Maggie Grace

quote: On one hand I am this weird androgynous tomboy where I'm strangely low maintenance and have a five-minute makeup regimen. On the other I'm obsessed with all things beauty, from skin care to makeup.
author: Rachel Zoe

quote: People are fighting over how our heartsongs are different. But they don't need to be the same. That's the beauty. We are a mosaic of gifts. Each of us has our inner beauty no matter how we look.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: I may be the first actress to admit that beauty doesn't hold you back. I think beauty is a gift that you have to make the most of. I've worked hard at trying to look my best.
author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: Encourage good music and art and literature in your homes. Homes that have a spirit of refinement and beauty will bless the lives of your children forever.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: As we all know, there is inner beauty and outer beauty. If we examine inner beauty, to me there is nothing more beautiful than inner peace, in a man or a woman.
author: Alice Greczyn

quote: When girls feel bad about their looks, 60 percent avoid normal daily activities like raising their hand in class or even going to the doctor. That means that girls do not show up for life when they don't feel good enough or pretty enough. A role model can help girls see beauty as a source of confidence, not anxiety.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: He who seeks truth shall find beauty. He who seeks beauty shall find vanity. He who seeks order shall find gratification. He who seeks gratification shall be disappointed. He who considers himself the servant of his fellow beings shall find the joy of self-expression. He who seeks self-expression shall fall into the pit of arrogance.
author: Moshe Safdie

quote: Circumstances in life often take us places that we never intended to go. We visit some places of beauty, others of pain and desolation.
author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: I didn't grow up around wild horses, no. But I've appreciated their beauty and their power ever since I can remember.
author: Ricky Schroder

quote: Some days, I know beauty techniques like it's my job, and other days I can't do my makeup for the life of me. So I find it easiest to just put on mineral veil and a little mascara and call it a day. I use Physician's Formula and Bare Minerals every day of my life.
author: Christian Serratos

quote: During the 'ballad' years for me, the politics was latent; I was just falling in love with the ballads and my boyfriend. And there was the beauty of the songs.
author: Joan Baez

quote: In your 20s you can be pretty, but you don't accomplish real beauty until you find wisdom and depth.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Why is it that scuba divers and surfers are some of the strongest advocates of ocean conservation? Because they've spent time in and around the ocean, and they've personally seen the beauty, the fragility, and even the degradation of our planet's blue heart.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: All the great religions have a place for awe, for ecstatic transport at the wonder and beauty of creation.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: High heels are like a beauty lift. In a flat, you can feel beautiful, but a stiletto changes your mood, how you move - like a wild, beautiful animal. The idea was always to follow a woman's wardrobe, her desires.
author: Giuseppe Zanotti

quote: I would like to show that I have a heart, that I am a human being and I have feelings. And to be this kind of role model, not only for beauty pageants but also for life.
author: Gabriela Isler

quote: Beauty, to me, is kind, generous, and people that are humble.
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: No matter how irrelevant social class now is, even the most eager egalitarian must be quietly proud that the posh English rose is still an industry standard for peerlessly sophisticated beauty.
author: Kate Reardon

quote: Combining music, theater and comedy is a new and broader form of expression. In certain combinations you can make people laugh one moment, cry the next, and then be astounded by the beauty of the music.
author: Aleksey Igudesman

quote: If you can visualize the whole of spring and see Paradise with the eye of belief, you may understand the utter majesty of everlasting Beauty. If you respond to that Beauty with the beauty of belief and worship, you will be a most beautiful creature.
author: Said Nursi

quote: Perfect is boring: Beauty is irregular.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: The spirit of L.A. is untamed wilderness. It's earthquakes and wildfires and oceans and mountain lions and fog. There's great physical beauty.
author: Dan Gilroy

quote: I love the fact that we are surrounded by this spectacular natural beauty that routinely strikes us dead. Hikers walk off into the woods and are never seen again. And still we tug on our fleece and skip off into the wilderness, not a care in the world.
author: Chelsea Cain

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I lend my daughter beauty products, but only as a treat. If she's going to a party, I'll let her borrow a mascara or moisturizer.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Poetry allies itself with beauty - a supreme union - but never uses it as its ultimate goal or sole nourishment.
author: Saint-John Perse

quote: If the universal is the essential, then it is the basis of all life and art. Recognizing and uniting with the universal therefore gives us the greatest aesthetic satisfaction, the greatest emotion of beauty.
author: Piet Mondrian

quote: We know the seductive alchemy of art. To transform private anguish into a narrative of truth, if not beauty; to make sense where there was none; to bring order out of chaos - these are the promises art makes.
author: Kathryn Harrison

quote: Phoenix is an interesting example. Drive around and see the golf courses everywhere, and you see people's big green lawns. And you live in a desert! I've always remarked about the capacity of human beings to look at somewhere and move there because of its uniqueness and its beauty and then change it.
author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.

quote: That's the beauty of YouTube. You can take whatever you want and create a video from your home and put it up, and you're just sharing it with your friends.
author: Todrick Hall

quote: I've always felt like an artistic person. I can't draw or paint or sculpt. I never really had technical skills, but I've always felt like I appreciate really beautiful things, and part of taking a good photograph is being able to recognize beauty.
author: Brandon Stanton

quote: All of the development I do is with the help of business advisors who are more like my best friends than just business people. They helped me as I created Ipsy back in 2011, which is a beauty community that ships out sampling bags to subscribers.
author: Michelle Phan

quote: Ipsy's goal has always been to create a community that inspires women around the world to express their own unique beauty.
author: Michelle Phan

quote: Nothing is really typical of my efforts... I'm simply casting about for better ways to crystallise and capture certain strong impressions (involving the elements of time, the unknown, cause and effect, fear, scenic and architectural beauty, and other seemingly ill-assorted things) which persist in clamouring for expression.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: He who marvels at the beauty of the world in summer will find equal cause for wonder and admiration in winter.
author: John Burroughs

quote: I think each woman has her own relationship to beauty.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: Life doesn't care about your vision. Stuff happens, and you've just got to deal with it. You roll with it; that's the beauty of it all.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: This quarterback Weeden can drive the ball down field. He's a thing of beauty on throwing a football. His passing motion and his arm, frankly, you won't see a more gifted passer, power, accuracy, the entire aspect of it.
author: Jerry Jones

quote: A woman can slip on a pair of embellished cage heels one night and a pair of streamlined, lightweight sneakers the next day. The beauty of modern luxury is the absence of rules.
author: Giuseppe Zanotti

quote: Beauty is subjective and should not be limited to only what we see on the outside.
author: Alek Wek

quote: I meet and talk to women from every corner of this planet, and I can find beauty in each and every one of them.
author: Alek Wek

quote: My mother never wore much make-up, and she was a kind of natural beauty; she knew just how to enhance what she had.
author: Francois Nars

quote: I think my biggest tip - and I consider it a part of my beauty routine - is getting my sleep, without a doubt. I do a true eight hours.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I suppose one of the challenges of writing the word-side of music these days is trying to decipher and communicate how this planet is very overwhelming at this point. The difficulties we face are overwhelming. It's very difficult to give yourself the time to breathe and appreciate the joy and beauty that might be just right around us.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: This is so cliche and cheesy but so true - seeing how happy people get if you A. give them a beauty product or B. give them a tip that works. There's such joy in finding a good beauty product.
author: Eva Chen

quote: We are presented with a unique situation in the black community in that we have embraced the beauty of hip hop, the real rawness of it, the real fun of it, but we also have to address the damage it has done. We have to look at what it's done to our black girls, especially when it comes to domestic violence.
author: Tamron Hall

quote: I am more interested in revolutionary beauty than in the great beauty, to be honest. Italian cinema is now mostly a bureau for tourism. We have given up that revolution of the contemporary.
author: Luca Guadagnino

quote: When I was 18, I took it for granted and was eager to move on to the bigger cities like Boston and then New York. But I've been to enough places to have gained a greater appreciation for the beauty and rich culture of all of Rhode Island. I am grateful for all that it offered during my childhood.
author: Joanna Going

quote: It's good to have a reminder that we can love ourselves and be beautiful even though we don't really fit into certain standards of what beauty may be.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: I think that with beauty, people jump to the end instead of starting from the beginning with a good lotion or prep.
author: Kat Graham

quote: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Every article on these islands has an almost personal character, which gives this simple life, where all art is unknown, something of the artistic beauty of medieval life.
author: John Millington Synge

quote: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: It was Chicago with its World's Fair which vivified the national desire for civic beauty.
author: Daniel Burnham

quote: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
author: Auguste Renoir

quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Old hands soil, it seems, whatever they caress, but they too have their beauty when they are joined in prayer. Young hands were made for caresses and the sheathing of love. It is a pity to make them join too soon.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Beauty deprived of its proper foils and adjuncts ceases to be enjoyed as beauty, just as light deprived of all shadows ceases to be enjoyed as light.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Beauty is altogether in the eye of the beholder.
author: Lew Wallace

quote: When I was young my Father used to tell me that the two most worthwhile pursuits in life were the pursuit of truth and of beauty and I believe that Alfred Nobel must have felt much the same when he gave these prizes for literature and the sciences.
author: Frederick Sanger

quote: You will also allow me to thank the Academy for inviting me to lecture in Stockholm, for its hospitality, and for the opportunity afforded me for admiring the charm of your people and the beauty of your country.
author: Guglielmo Marconi

quote: Coming in solemn beauty like slow old tunes of Spain.
author: John Masefield

quote: The beauty of doing film is that you construct whatever you do block by block and you can build something that will stay.
author: Michel Gondry

quote: Beauty and folly are old companions.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When I say that human beings are just gene machines, one shouldn't put too much emphasis on the word 'just.' There is a very great deal of complication, and indeed beauty in being a gene machine.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I'm just glad I was able to return to some of that innocence and beauty I had as a child when I started my own family, and my children brought me back some of that spirit.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple.
author: Cate Blanchett

quote: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty.
author: John Wooden

quote: Paris is one of the most beautiful places in all the world. Unfortunately, I was so homesick I couldn't appreciate its beauty.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Because beauty will be so readily accessible, and skin color and features will be similar, prejudices based on physical features will be nearly eradicated. Prejudice will be socioeconomically based.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I accidentally entered a youth pageant when I was 14. That's like a beauty pageant, but without the beauty. It was terrible.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Part of the beauty of Silicon Valley is that people generally encourage you to think crazy. It's the hypothesis that there's nothing sacred that can't be changed.
author: Anne Wojcicki

quote: I'm from Canada, and New Zealand feels like you took all the best bits of Canada and squished them onto a tiny island like Hawaii. I was absolutely blown away by the beauty of the South Island.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: If you go through life, and you don't find the beauty in an unexpected place, then you really have a sad existence.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: When I look at the majority of my own songs they really came from my own sense of personal confusion or need to express some pain or beauty - they were coming from a universal and personal place.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
author: Ovid

quote: I think the beauty of the writing of 'Game of Thrones' is not that the characters are fearless; it's how they overcome their fear, you know?
author: Natalie Dormer

quote: Through Kurt I saw the beauty of minimalism and the importance of music that's stripped down.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: I didn't appreciate the young woman that I was, or my young beauty, because I was so obsessed with the fact that I felt fat. It's never good to add to anybody else's suffering. It's an important topic to really get the gravity and the importance of - dealing with dignity.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: The beauty about being a producer is you sit there, and you explore ideas which become a passion, which slowly becomes a reality.
author: Michelle Yeoh

quote: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer.
author: Joan Collins

quote: Surely being a Professional Beauty - let alone an ageing one - is one of the most insecure and doomed careers imaginable.
author: Julie Burchill

quote: We make such terrible mistakes with visual choices about beauty.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: I am still a victim of chess. It has all the beauty of art - and much more. It cannot be commercialized. Chess is much purer than art in its social position.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: I consider myself someone who takes a lot of beauty risks, and I've realized what I liar I am. I change my hair a lot, from blue to blonde to bald, but I'm trying to branch out a little more with makeup.
author: Halsey

quote: Part of the beauty of Judaism, and surely this is so for other faiths also, is that it gently restores control over time. Three times a day we stop what we are doing and turn to God in prayer. We recover perspective. We inhale a deep breath of eternity.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: I have learned that acting is not about beauty.
author: Vincent Cassel

quote: To me, part of the beauty of a comma is that it offers a rest, like one in music: a break that gives the whole piece of music greater shape, deeper harmony. It allows us to catch our breath.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: Riding my motorcycle around L.A. is like my own video game. But unlike many folks at the wheel, I am occupied with getting where I'm going and keeping myself safe. Most people are applying makeup, texting, and checking out the beauty in the next car.
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: The whole beauty of music is that it goes where your words won't let you.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Talent survives and remains while beauty is diluted.
author: Gael Garcia Bernal

quote: Sometimes the beauty is easy. Sometimes you don't have to try at all. Sometimes you can hear the wind blow in a handshake. Sometimes there's poetry written right on the bathroom wall.
author: Ani DiFranco

quote: Editing yourself is like an irksome coin toss. You've got to strip yourself of super ego and operate from the id. Maybe I've got my Freud mixed up. It's just hard to trade a beauty shot for the performance with truth and a brightly lit zit.
author: Vera Farmiga

quote: The past itself, as historical change continues to accelerate, has become the most surreal of subjects - making it possible... to see a new beauty in what is vanishing.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: I have always loved Reese Witherspoon and Amy Adams as role models - I read all their interviews and agree with the fundamentals of how they manage the limelight and also how they look and carry themselves. A huge part of beauty is how you carry yourself and how you deal with certain situations.
author: Brittany Snow

quote: I relax by catching up with my friends and family. When I am at home in Ibiza, I find the contrast of living on a divided island relaxing - with beauty and tranquillity in the north and a sense of fun, shallowness and celebration in the south.
author: James Blunt

quote: I don't really have a beauty routine. I always use coconut oil, and I always wear mascara. That's kind of it! I'm pretty simple.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Here is a fundamental conflict in educated society: We are not supposed to value beauty so highly, and yet who can defend against its sheer power to move, its rhetorical force?
author: Russell Smith

quote: My mother always called me an ugly weed, so I never was aware of anything until I was older. Plain girls should have someone telling them they are beautiful. Sometimes this works miracles.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: I like 'Zorro.' I like people you can believe that don't have those stupid powers. That is the beauty of Zorro. He's just a guy working for the people, to save the people.
author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: I had seen the ballet of 'Swan Lake' as a child but it was as an adult, when I saw a production featuring Erik Bruhn, that I first noticed how significant a part the ever-present threat of violence played. This juxtaposition of great beauty and grace with a backdrop of pure evil stayed with me for years.
author: Walter Dean Myers

quote: In Japan, the people preserve their temples for their exquisite beauty, and there are a great many sincere Buddhists; but China is irreligious: a nation of atheists or agnostics, or slaves of impious superstitions. In an extended tramp among temples, I have not seen a single male worshiper or a thing to please the eye.
author: Isabella Bird

quote: I am a great lover of art, in many forms: paintings, objets, textiles. I don't have the talent for painting, but I have a very good sense of colour, a love of visual beauty.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Beauty, like ice, our footing does betray; Who can tread sure on the smooth, slippery way: Pleased with the surface, we glide swiftly on, And see the dangers that we cannot shun.
author: John Dryden

quote: Having done a Dogme film taught me the beauty of simplicity and austerity.
author: Susanne Bier

quote: I like aristocracy. I like the beauty of aristocracy. I like the hierarchical feeling.
author: James Salter

quote: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
author: Celine Dion

quote: Beauty is not skin-deep; it can be a means of self-affirmation, a true indicator of personality and confidence.
author: Aimee Mullins

quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: There is no personal achievement in being born beautiful.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
author: Loretta Young

quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: For I must tell you that we artists cannot tread the path of Beauty without Eros keeping company with us and appointing himself as our guide.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: Now, I'm not saying I'm fashionable, but there are sociological interests that matter to me, things that are theoretical, political, intellectual and also concerned with vanity and beauty that we all think about but that I try to mix up and translate into fashion.
author: Miuccia Prada

quote: Fashion fosters cliches of beauty, but I want to tear them apart.
author: Miuccia Prada

quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: I hate the term 'arm candy.' But, look, a woman's figure is a beautiful thing, and if she has shapely legs, then she should show them off, because men love to see that. Not just heterosexual men - gay men like to see a woman in her beauty and the shape of her.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: There are always young bands playing in their garages. A lot of punk rock is not going to be in the mainstream. It's below the radar. The beauty of it is that you're not supposed to always know. It's subterranean.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: My dad had this philosophy that if you tell children they're beautiful and wonderful then they believe it, and they will be. So I never thought I was unattractive. But I was never one of the girls at school who had lots of boyfriends.
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: The beauty of the Internet is that anybody can be a broadcaster now.
author: Jeff Zucker

quote: My quick beauty tip is always have a tinted gloss of some kind to give you some color even if you have no makeup on.
author: Rachel Bilson

quote: The beauty of man's being, fashioned as he is in the fairest of forms, demonstrates the existence of the Maker, while at the same time the fact that, together with his comprehensive abilities, lodged in that fairest of forms, he soon declines and dies, demonstrates the existence of the resurrection.
author: Said Nursi

quote: There is little premium in poetry in a world that thinks of Pound and Whitman as a weight and a sampler, not an Ezra, a Walt, a thing of beauty, a joy forever.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Not just as a black woman, but as a woman, since the beginning of time, beauty has been our responsibility.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: After 'Freaks and Geeks,' I dealt with several producers who wanted to cover up all my beauty marks, every single mole on my body. They tried to cover them on my first two episodes of 'Dawson's Creek,' and it just looked ridiculous, so I had to put my foot down. But it's not something I'm insecure about.
author: Busy Philipps

quote: So every creative act strives to attain an absolute status it longs to create a world of beauty to triumph over chaos and convert it to order.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: Grace is in garments, in movements, in manners; beauty in the nude, and in forms. This is true of bodies; but when we speak of feelings, beauty is in their spirituality, and grace in their moderation.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I cannot go to Montreal without going to Beauty's, my favorite place for breakfast, where I have the Mish-Mash omelet with hot dogs, salami, eggs, green peppers, and onions, and the best banana bread in the world. It's legendary!
author: Gail Simmons

quote: Beauty and fullness of tone can be achieved by having the whole orchestra play with high clarinets and a carefully selected number of piccolos.
author: Gustav Mahler

quote: Some guys say beauty is only skin deep. But when you walk into a party, you don't see somebody's brain. The initial contact has to be the sniffing.
author: James Caan

quote: Beauty at 70 years old isn't the same as beauty at 20 years old, but it is stunning nonetheless.
author: Victoria Moran

quote: There is great beauty in going through life without anxiety or fear. Half our fears are baseless, and the other half discreditable.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: All cities are mad: but the madness is gallant. All cities are beautiful: but the beauty is grim.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Filipinos want beauty. I have to look beautiful so that the poor Filipinos will have a star to look at from their slums.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: Personalized beauty is about each woman being able to create her own makeup routine that complements her coloring and style.
author: Bobbi Brown

quote: And for me, the real world involves everything: risk, danger, beauty, energy, all we meet with in the real world.
author: Christo

quote: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
author: James Dean

quote: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.
author: Amanda Peet

quote: It's amazing what sleep does for your looks.
author: Emily Procter

quote: Vampires have always held a very seductive kind of lore and have always been some variety of attractive, whether it's attractiveness that's born of just the physical attributes that they have - this kind of ethereal beauty or translucent pallor - or whether it is more to do with the way they carry themselves.
author: Colin Farrell

quote: So far as female beauty is concerned, the Circassian women have no superiors. They have preserved in their mountain home the purity of the Grecian models, and still display the perfect physical loveliness, whose type has descended to us in the Venus de Medici.
author: Bayard Taylor

quote: If you've never had a mother or a father, you grow up seeking something you're never going to find, ever. You seek it in love and in people and in beauty.
author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quote: I grew up in a family where we weren't allowed to talk about beauty or to put any emphasis on physical appearance.
author: Pam Grier

quote: Black beauty - he's a dark horse.
author: Tim Vine

quote: I'm a great believer in the beauty and the power of surprise.
author: Mark Gatiss

quote: I'm a storyteller: the crux of the matter is to reach beauty, poetry; it doesn't matter if that is comedy or tragedy. They're the same if you reach the beauty.
author: Roberto Benigni

quote: So, we just kind of created our own thing and that's part of the beauty of Athens: is that it's so off the map and there's no way you could ever be the East Village or an L.A. scene or a San Francisco scene, that it just became its own thing.
author: Michael Stipe

quote: One of my favorite beauty products is Vincent Longo Water Canvas creamy blush. I have it in every color and I've been using it for 5 years and that's all I put on when I leave the house. It looks so natural I just put a little bit on my cheeks to give them some color.
author: Alessandra Ambrosio

quote: Asian people have a unique way about them and a different sense of beauty. It's exotic to me. I like they way Asians project their feelings. There's a hardness to the culture, but at the same time there's a delicateness.
author: Paz Vega

quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
author: Eva Herzigova

quote: I completely agree that a sound sleep is the best beauty product. Sound sleep, one of the most important but underrated thing, helps to make you more beautiful. I can never understand how people work so hard that they miss out on their sleep.
author: Shraddha Kapoor

quote: Red lipstick has been my beauty staple for years. I show up to Pilates or yoga at 8 A.M. wearing my red lipstick.
author: Liz Goldwyn

quote: I have always loved young women for their sensitive spiritual nature, gentleness, and special beauty.
author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quote: As a busy working mom I'm always pressed for time, so a quick and easy beauty routine is key!
author: Angela Kinsey

quote: My mother is a beauty.
author: Mary-Louise Parker

quote: But the beauty of Einstein's equations, for example, is just as real to anyone who's experienced it as the beauty of music. We've learned in the 20th century that the equations that work have inner harmony.
author: Edward Witten

quote: Though beauty gives you a weird sense of entitlement, it's rather frightening and threatening to have others ascribe such importance to something you know you're just renting for a while.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: Beauty set up distance between other people and me. It warped their behavior.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: Even if you play perfectly, a fault of your opponent's can destroy the entire beauty of the game.
author: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: Remember always that the composer's pen is still mightier than the bow of the violinist in you lie all the possibilities of the creation of beauty.
author: John Philip Sousa

quote: Especially as a title-holder, you can do great things with charities, because people suddenly care about what you have to say. I wanted to make a difference, which is why I created the Queen of the Universe pageant. I want to change all of those stigmas in the beauty pageant world.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: In the 19th century, you had bourgeois art without politics - an almost frozen idea of what beauty is.
author: Douglas Sirk

quote: I love fashion, beauty, glamour. It's the mark of civilisation.
author: David LaChapelle

quote: We live in a state with a wonderful climate and plenty of natural beauty, from the shores of Cumberland Island to the Chattahoochee River to the Blue Ridge Mountains.
author: Roy Barnes

quote: It's how you look at beauty. Is it only an outward appearance with hair and makeup and a hot body, or is it something deeper than that?
author: Hilary Swank

quote: The very women who object to the morals of a notoriously beautiful actress, grow big with pride when an admirer suggests their marked resemblance to this stage beauty in physique.
author: Minna Antrim

quote: I can hold a cup of sake on a full moon in Japan, and the reflection of the moon in that little cup can make me feel so enthusiastic about beauty. That one good, magical moment can give me enough to create other things like the teardrop earring or necklace.
author: Elsa Peretti

quote: One of the most beautiful passages of Rousseau is that in the sixth book of Confessions, where he describes the awakening in him of the literary sense. Of such wisdom, the poetic passion, the desire of beauty, the love of art for its own sake, has most.
author: Walter Pater

quote: I can't imagine it if beauty was the only currency I used as an actress. It just doesn't interest me.
author: Hayley Atwell

quote: My work is not about 'form follows function,' but 'form follows beauty' or, even better, 'form follows feminine.'
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: My father always taught by telling stories about his experiences. His lessons were about morality and art and what insects and birds and human beings had in common. He told me what it meant to be a man and to be a Black man. He taught me about love and responsibility, about beauty, and how to make gumbo.
author: Walter Mosley

quote: Beauty and the Beast became the first animated feature ever nominated for best picture.
author: Leonard Maltin

quote: But I think it is a serious issue to wonder about the other platonic absolutes of say beauty and morality.
author: Roger Penrose

quote: Beauty is everlasting And dust is for a time.
author: Marianne Moore

quote: I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: I've backpacked to countries like Italy and Turkey and observed beautiful scenery, but then I realized that beauty was always very close to me. It is here in Belitung Island, where the rivers, beaches and the terrain captivate my attention most.
author: Andrea Hirata

quote: 'A Court of Thorns and Roses' was actually inspired by three of my all-time-favorite fairy/folktales: 'Beauty and the Beast,' 'East of the Sun, West of the Moon' and 'Tam Lin.' I got the kernel of inspiration by wondering: 'What if 'Beauty' was a huntress?'
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: Beauty is less important than quality.
author: Eugene Ormandy

quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Beauty is the disinterested one, without which the ancient world refused to understand itself, a word which both imperceptibly and yet unmistakably has bid farewell to our new world, a world of interests, leaving it to its own avarice and sadness.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Art ought never to be considered except in its relations with its ideal beauty.
author: Alfred de Vigny

quote: The truth, the absolute truth, is that the chief beauty for the theatre consists in fine bodily proportions.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: For me, a page of good prose is where one hears the rain and the noise of battle. It has the power to give grief or universality that lends it a youthful beauty.
author: John Cheever

quote: Beauty is not everything!
author: Chita Rivera

quote: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.
author: Bela Karolyi

quote: I may be old-fashioned. But I believe there is such a thing as a search for beauty - a delight in the nice things in the world. And I don't think one should have to apologise for it.
author: Saul Leiter

quote: 'Changes in Latitudes' began when I was looking at a photograph of a sea turtle swimming underwater. I had such a strong feeling for the beauty of this ancient creature, at home in the sea. On the spot, I wanted to swim with that turtle. I began to imagine a character who would do just that.
author: Will Hobbs

quote: I say to the young, be happy that you were born in Italy because of the beauty of the human capital, both masculine and feminine, of this country... No other country has such human capital.
author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

quote: Fashion is quite inclusive and good at embracing different things and different forms of beauty. It's a very liberal industry. You can be yourself. Just not overweight.
author: Andrej Pejic

quote: If our hearts are ready for anything, we are touched by the beauty and poetry and mystery that fill our world.
author: Tara Brach

quote: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: I think everybody can be beautiful. Anybody can have beauty. It's about how you look at the world, in a way, and how you treat yourself.
author: Elizabeth Peyton

quote: All things are perceived in the light of charity, and hence under the aspect of beauty; for beauty is simply reality seen with the eyes of love.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: He was afflicted by the thought that where Beauty was, nothing ever ran quite straight, which no doubt, was why so many people looked on it as immoral.
author: John Galsworthy

quote: For me the greatest beauty always lies in the greatest clarity.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: There's one more thing I want to say. It's a touchy subject. Black beauty. Black sensuality. We live in a culture where the beauty of black people isn't always as celebrated as other types. I'd like to help change that if I can!
author: Jody Watley

quote: The South is very beautiful but its beauty makes one sad because the lives that people live here, and have lived here, are so ugly.
author: James Baldwin

quote: My mum is my beauty icon, because she represents what I think beauty is.
author: Bar Refaeli

quote: Talent, like beauty, to be pardoned, must be obscure and unostentatious.
author: Marguerite Gardiner

quote: The real sin against life is to abuse and destroy beauty, even one's own even more, one's own, for that has been put in our care and we are responsible for its well-being.
author: Katherine Anne Porter

quote: Beauty is in the character of a person. It's about having an interesting face and about what's inside. Anyone can take a good picture.
author: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: I was always anti-marriage. I didn't understand monogamy. I couldn't figure out how that could last. And then I met Bryn and I started to understand the beauty of constancy and history and change and going on the roller coaster with someone - of having a partner in life.
author: Maria Bello

quote: But, when the work was finished, the Craftsman kept wishing that there were someone to ponder the plan of so great a work, to love its beauty, and to wonder at its vastness.
author: Giovanni Pico della Mirandola

quote: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase.
author: Bernard Berenson

quote: The closest thing I use to beauty products is the grease on the pizza from John's Pizzeria.
author: Mark Feuerstein

quote: Beauty, of course, is the most important requirement and the paramount asset of the applicant.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
author: Fay Weldon

quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
author: Bryan Procter

quote: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.
author: Phil Ochs

quote: I loved Belle in 'Beauty and the Beast.' I just wanted to be her. I'm a brunette, so I think I kind of cling to all those princesses that have brown hair. I just wanted to be them.
author: Kara Lindsay

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: In places where this beauty has already disappeared, we will reconstruct it.
author: Fritz Todt

quote: Sometimes, homely things are done for the best reasons in the world and thus achieve a beauty of their own.
author: Gene Weingarten

quote: The ever increasing spiritual damage caused by life within the big city will make this hunger practically uncontrollable when we build here on this the landscape of our homeland we must be clear that we will protect its beauty.
author: Fritz Todt

quote: When works of art are presented like rare butterflies on the walls, they're decontextualized. We admire their beauty, and I have nothing against that, per se. But there is more to art than that.
author: Hans Haacke

quote: What I loved about 'Summer' was that they were these four bright kids with a wonderful future. In a way, she was the one with the brains, and then you have the beauty queen and the jock and the introvert.
author: Kevin Williamson

quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
author: Rosalind Russell

quote: Familiarity is a magician that is cruel to beauty but kind to ugliness.
author: Ouida

quote: It is the addition of strangeness to beauty that constitutes the romantic character in art.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: Even in decline, a virtuous man increases the beauty of his behavior. A burning stick, though turned to the ground, has its flame drawn upwards.
author: Saskya Pandita

quote: I can't live without my beauty products. I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.
author: Traci Bingham

quote: Beauty, the eternal Spouse of the Wisdom of God and Angel of his Presence thru' all creation.
author: Robert Bridges

quote: Turkey was fantastic, Turkey was, like, mystical and such a special place. Just unique, something that's really hard to describe, such beauty, those mountains and the stone is kind of, eroded? Special erosion which makes what you see just something that seems, it's been made for a movie, it's like something out of fantasy, except it's real.
author: Violante Placido

quote: I always carry lip balm and lipstick. Lipstick is a very important beauty product because I find that lips are the most beautiful feature of anyone's face.
author: Fan Bingbing

quote: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
author: Redd Foxx

quote: I know a lot of aesthetically beautiful women who are not nice people, and they do not come across as beautiful to me. I think the number one thing for beauty is a smile. I love a woman with a beautiful smile.
author: Sara Foster

quote: I always loved Belle from 'Beauty and the Beast'. I always thought I looked like her, so I dressed like her for every Halloween.
author: Sofia Carson

quote: I'm now more about romantic beauty. The dominatrix thing is over. You never look as good in person as you do in 'Maxim,' but it's fun. It's all like a fantasy.
author: Julianna Guill

quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
author: Anouk Aimee

quote: Mathematics are the result of mysterious powers which no one understands, and which the unconscious recognition of beauty must play an important part. Out of an infinity of designs a mathematician chooses one pattern for beauty's sake and pulls it down to earth.
author: Marston Morse

quote: I've been working with Disney all these years doing voice work, and now I'm signed with Disney Fine Arts, doing 'Beauty and the Beast' oil paintings. So it's been an ongoing wonderful job.
author: Paige O'Hara

quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
author: Jules Renard

quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Be stupid, be dumb, be funny, if that's who you are. Don't try to be someone that society wants you to be; that's stupid. So be yourself.
author: Christina Grimmie

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
author: Saul Bellow

quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: We are all here on earth to help others what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
author: Ron White

quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
author: Thor Heyerdahl

quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

quote: I had everything I'd hoped for, but I wasn't being myself. So I decided to be honest about who I was. It was strange: The people who loved me for being funny suddenly didn't like me for being... me.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: All generalizations are false, including this one.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: What's another word for Thesaurus?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
author: George Carlin

quote: Man cannot live by bread alone he must have peanut butter.
author: James A. Garfield

quote: Drawing on my fine command of the English language, I said nothing.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: We owe a lot to Thomas Edison - if it wasn't for him, we'd be watching television by candlelight.
author: Milton Berle

quote: My life needs editing.
author: Mort Sahl

quote: I have had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: If my life wasn't funny, it would just be true, and that's unacceptable.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: Christopher Columbus, as everyone knows, is honored by posterity because he was the last to discover America.
author: James Joyce

quote: Part of my act is meant to shake you up. It looks like I'm being funny, but I'm reminding you of other things. Life is tough, darling. Life is hard. And we better laugh at everything; otherwise, we're going down the tube.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I buy expensive suits. They just look cheap on me.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Do not worry about avoiding temptation. As you grow older it will avoid you.
author: Joey Adams

quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I don't care what the haters and naysayers say. If they make jokes about me, I'll laugh because they'll probably be funny.
author: Paula Deen

quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: It's funny what memory does, isn't it? My favorite holiday tradition might not have happened more than once or twice. But because it is such a good memory, so encapsulating of everything I love about the holidays, in my mind it happened every year. Without fail.
author: Molly O'Keefe

quote: You know the funny thing, I don't get along with rich people. I get along with the middle class and the poor people better than I get along with the rich people.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I was eating in a Chinese restaurant downtown. There was a dish called Mother and Child Reunion. It's chicken and eggs. And I said, I gotta use that one.
author: Paul Simon

quote: You can lead a man to Congress, but you can't make him think.
author: Milton Berle

quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: O Lord, help me to be pure, but not yet.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
author: James Thurber

quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: There is nothing funny about Halloween. This sarcastic festival reflects, rather, an infernal demand for revenge by children on the adult world.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Being funny is one of my greatest strengths. I can make girls smile when they're down, and when they're having a good time, I can carry on the joke.
author: John Krasinski

quote: Instant gratification takes too long.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
author: Eminem

quote: I hate housework! You make the beds, you do the dishes and six months later you have to start all over again.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
author: George Carlin

quote: I was so naive as a kid I used to sneak behind the barn and do nothing.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I believe in rules. Sure I do. If there weren't any rules, how could you break them?
author: Leo Durocher

quote: Expert: a man who makes three correct guesses consecutively.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Ignoring fame was my rebellion, in a funny way. I was insistent on being normal and doing normal things. It probably wasn't advisable to go to college in America and room with a complete stranger. And it probably wasn't wise to share a bathroom with eight other people in a coed dorm. Looking back, that was crazy.
author: Emma Watson

quote: There's only one true superpower amongst human beings, and that is being funny. People treat you differently if you can make them laugh.
author: Jeff Garlin

quote: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met.
author: Herb Caen

quote: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
author: Les Dawson

quote: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny. Next. Everyone gets so upset about the wrong things.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I am certain there is too much certainty in the world.
author: Michael Crichton

quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
author: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: The funny thing about having all this so-called success is that behind it is a certain horrible emptiness.
author: Sam Shepard

quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
author: Fred Allen

quote: I'm quite sarcastic, and I'm funny, but not kind of funny. It's a weird funny, and some people don't get me, and some people do.
author: Millie Bobby Brown

quote: I usually stalk fans because I think they're really funny on Twitter. They don't know it, but I'll just go through their timelines, and if something is happening in the media, I always read fan accounts instead of the news because they have all the info and make the funniest jokes about it, so that's how I get my gossip - by stalking fans.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I call myself the Amusement Park. That's because I'm funny and scary at the same time.
author: Terry Crews

quote: I love mankind it's people I can't stand.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: The parrot's so funny. He imitates me and I don't even realize he's doing it. I'm walking around the house talking to myself and whistling and the next day he's said something I've said... it's scary you know?
author: Mick Ralphs

quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is we'll find it.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Never put a sock in a toaster.
author: Eddie Izzard

quote: I have never been hurt by what I have not said.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: I'm for whatever gets you through the night.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I failed to make the chess team because of my height.
author: Woody Allen

quote: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: People always ask me, 'Were you funny as a child?' Well, no, I was an accountant.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: When we talk to God, we're praying. When God talks to us, we're schizophrenic.
author: Jane Wagner

quote: I've never met a funny person who wasn't smart. I've met a lot of dramatic people who were stupid. But I've never met a funny person who wasn't smart.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: It's so funny, you go to acting school thinking you're going to learn how to be other people, but really it taught me how to be myself. Because it's in understanding yourself deeply that you can lend yourself to another person's circumstances and another person's experience.
author: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: I love airports because funny things always happen at them. They're giant complexes full of urgency, seriousness, and confusion. Where am I supposed to be? Which way do I go? And that's just the staff.
author: Rhys Darby

quote: Actually being funny is mostly telling the truth about things.
author: Bernard Sahlins

quote: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: If at first you don't succeed... so much for skydiving.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Being funny wasn't a career choice growing up, it was my way out of situations; a way to survive another day.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: I find, when you're an optimist, life has a funny way of looking after you.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: Be obscure clearly.
author: E. B. White

quote: Nobody ever went broke underestimating the taste of the American public.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: A word to the wise is infuriating.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I never said most of the things I said.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Yield to temptation. It may not pass your way again.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: If you could cross a lion and a monkey, that's what I'd be, because monkeys are funny and lions are strong.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
author: Don Marquis

quote: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I don't deserve this award, but I have arthritis and I don't deserve that either.
author: Jack Benny

quote: If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
author: Jack Benny

quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day.
author: Jay Leno

quote: Boy, those French: they have a different word for everything!
author: Steve Martin

quote: My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare.
author: Mike Myers

quote: Children are smarter than any of us. Know how I know that? I don't know one child with a full time job and children.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: I went window shopping today! I bought four windows.
author: Tommy Cooper

quote: I wanna make a jigsaw puzzle that's 40,000 pieces. And when you finish it, it says 'go outside.'
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I never thought I was funny, but I enjoy being funny.
author: Nora Dunn

quote: At the end of the day it's got to be a good movie, it's got to be a funny movie, and it's got to make people think, 'Hey, I couldn't have spent my time any better.'
author: Tom Hanks

quote: To all the girls out there who think being funny is not sexy, you are wrong!
author: Chad Michael Murray

quote: When I'm with my friends I'm funny, but I don't feel like I'm a funny clown.
author: Nora Dunn

quote: A funny thing happens in real estate. When it comes back, it comes back up like gangbusters.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: You know, it wasn't even that I'm a funny guy, I just loved stand-up comedy and I wanted to do it. It was one of the few things in my life that I knew I was going to be able to do, and I also felt as though I'd be able to do it the way I wanted to do it.
author: Bill Burr

quote: I have an unfortunate personality.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Turns out you have a really fun time if you go to work every day and focus on being silly and funny and happy!
author: Hannah Murray

quote: It's a funny thing that when a man hasn't anything on earth to worry about, he goes off and gets married.
author: Robert Frost

quote: I was just a goofy little funny kid, who was always getting sent to the principal. It wasn't serious because I was smart. I wasn't like a true troublemaker, just rambunctious - like, talkative and trying to be funny. That was me in middle-school.
author: J. Cole

quote: I was asked to act when I couldn't act. I was asked to sing 'Funny Face' when I couldn't sing, and dance with Fred Astaire when I couldn't dance - and do all kinds of things I wasn't prepared for. Then I tried like mad to cope with it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Without hurting anybody, we all tend to laugh at others' discomfort. When someone slips on a banana skin and falls it's funny.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: I think if everyone would write down the funny stories from their own childhoods, the world would be a better place.
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: Too much agreement kills a chat.
author: Eldridge Cleaver

quote: I got a lot of support from my parents. That's the one thing I always appreciated. They didn't tell me I was being stupid they told me I was being funny.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: I have a funny mental framework when I do physics. I create an imaginary audience in my head to explain things to - it is part of the way I think. For me, teaching and explaining, even to my imaginary audience, is part of the process.
author: Leonard Susskind

quote: TV is chewing gum for the eyes.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: What contemptible scoundrel has stolen the cork to my lunch?
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: I cannot sing, dance or act; what else would I be but a talk show host.
author: David Letterman

quote: I rant, therefore I am.
author: Dennis Miller

quote: Why do you have to be a nonconformist like everybody else?
author: James Thurber

quote: If it weren't for Philo T. Farnsworth, inventor of television, we'd still be eating frozen radio dinners.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Our national flower is the concrete cloverleaf.
author: Lewis Mumford

quote: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Don't talk about yourself it will be done when you leave.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: The one thing you shouldn't do is try to tell a cab driver how to get somewhere.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: A vegetarian is a person who won't eat anything that can have children.
author: David Brenner

quote: I don't say things to be offensive I say things because they're funny to me. It amuses me.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: I didn't plan to be the rude middle-class comedian. You write a certain type of joke that you find funny, and mine happen to be often rude. Yes, it's juvenile, but that's me.
author: Jimmy Carr

quote: We adore babies because they're so cute. And, of course, we are amused by jokes because they are funny. This is all backwards. It is. And Darwin shows us why.
author: Daniel Dennett

quote: I basically started performing for my mother, going, 'Love me!' What drives you to perform is the need for that primal connection. When I was little, my mother was funny with me, and I started to be charming and funny for her, and I learned that by being entertaining, you make a connection with another person.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Filming is a funny combination of having a good time and not being able to wait until it's over.
author: Nicole Holofcener

quote: All these jokes have been pre-approved as funny by me.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: It is funny that men who are supposed to be scientific cannot get themselves to realise the basic principle of physics, that action and reaction are equal and opposite, that when you persecute people you always rouse them to be strong and stronger.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: I think it's a comedian's job to make everything funny. Nothing is off-limits.
author: Donald Glover
