quote: I find it funny how people from Boston and New York hate each other because of pro teams. But, like, everyone on the Red Sox is a random millionaire athlete from somewhere else.
author: Julian Casablancas

quote: Sex is funny and love is serious.
author: Stephan Jenkins

quote: I love funny people, and when I'm with funny people, or people who are amusing in their weirdness, I love it. Because that to me is funny, as opposed to someone who stops and says, 'Hey let me tell you a joke.'
author: Paul Feig

quote: The fact is I'm choosy, but mainly about a man's character. He has to be interesting, funny and clever. I don't even mind if he's not very good-looking.
author: Agyness Deyn

quote: I saw a stationery store move.
author: Jay London

quote: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
author: Alexander Woollcott

quote: Its funny, because for females in general - not just in music, but the corporate ladder as well - anything we do has always been harder for us. When it comes to music, the industry wants you to conform, to look like this and to sound like this and do this or that. It makes it harder. It's harder for us to come out and be bosses and lead the pack.
author: Missy Elliott

quote: For years I used to bore my wife over lunch with stories about funny incidents.
author: James Herriot

quote: I did not have three thousand pairs of shoes, I had one thousand and sixty.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often - but I'm well preserved.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Chaos in the midst of chaos isn't funny, but chaos in the midst of order is.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Life can be dramatic and funny all in the same day.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: I've thought for the last decade or so, the only actual place raw truth was seeping through in newspapers was on the Comics Pages. They were able to pull off intelligent social comment, pure truths not found elsewhere in the news pages, and had the ability to make it all funny, entertaining, and pertinent.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: There's nothing I dislike more than being in a photo shoot where they say, 'Be yourself.' That's not why I became an actress. That's what I find so funny: that you become an actor, and all of a sudden, everyone wants to know about you. But I didn't become an actor so I could show you me.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: I'm fascinated with the stories that we tell. Real histories become fantasies and fairy tales, morality tales and fables. There's something interesting and funny and perverse about the way fairytale sometimes passes for history, for truth.
author: Kara Walker

quote: He looks as though he's been weaned on a pickle.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: Every dogma has its day.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: Men are only as loyal as their options.
author: Bill Maher

quote: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Thinking is one thing no one has ever been able to tax.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint.
author: Don Marquis

quote: I've never been married, but I tell people I'm divorced so they won't think something is wrong with me.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: Moderation is a virtue only in those who are thought to have an alternative.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: All my life, I always wanted to be somebody. Now I see that I should have been more specific.
author: Jane Wagner

quote: What I am looking for is a blessing not in disguise.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: Never floss with a stranger.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Miami Beach is where neon goes to die.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: When you're eight years old nothing is your business.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: We need two kinds of acquaintances, one to complain to, while to the others we boast.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Turn up the lights. I don't want to go home in the dark.
author: O. Henry

quote: Never fight an inanimate object.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I was a vegetarian until I started leaning toward the sunlight.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Why don't you get out of that wet coat and into a dry martini?
author: Robert Benchley

quote: I bought some batteries, but they weren't included.
author: Steven Wright

quote: You can do anything with bayonets except sit on them.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: There is nothing in the world that I loathe more than group activity, that communal bath where the hairy and slippery mix in a multiplication of mediocrity.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: I like children - fried.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Even Napoleon had his Watergate.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Macho does not prove mucho.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: There's no such thing as soy milk. It's soy juice.
author: Lewis Black

quote: My father would take me to the playground, and put me on mood swings.
author: Jay London

quote: God did not intend religion to be an exercise club.
author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: That's my only goal. Surround myself with funny people, and make sure everyone has a good time and works hard.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: The next time you have a thought... let it go.
author: Ron White

quote: If you can't tell a spoon from a ladle, then you're fat!
author: Demetri Martin

quote: It's not so much what you learn about Mumbai, it's what you learn about yourself, really. It's a funny old hippie thing, but it's true as well. You find out a lot about yourself and your tolerance, and about your inclusiveness.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: Hurried and worried until we're buried, and there's no curtain call, Lifes a very funny proposition after all.
author: George M. Cohan

quote: Only bad golfers are lucky. They're the ones bouncing balls off trees, curbs, turtles and cars. Good golfers have bad luck. When you hit the ball straight, a funny bounce is bound to be unlucky.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: People want me to be funny all the time. They think I'm being funny no matter what I say or do and that's not the case.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: I was the class podiatrist. I never made it to class clown. I wasn't funny enough. I would examine feet and prescribe and ointment. It was a sad childhood.
author: Gilbert Gottfried

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: What I like best is a book that's at least funny once in a while. What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: I have only been funny about seventy four per cent of the time. Yes I think that is right. Seventy-four per cent of the time.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: During the Great Depression, when people laughed their worries disappeared. Audiences loved these funny men. I decided to become one.
author: Jerry Stiller

quote: Some of the pictures I must say every now and then I just think are going to be funny. When it gets that much, you might as well just pull out all the stops and make it more of a burlesque.
author: Martin Mull

quote: I like smart, funny, self-deprecating men.
author: Jules Asner

quote: It's a funny thing, the less people have to live for, the less nerve they have to risk losing nothing.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: I love nerds. Comic-Con junkies are the tastemakers of tomorrow. Isn't that funny? The tables have turned.
author: Kristen Bell

quote: I'm blonde and tanned and normal-sized! I'm sweet, shy, funny, have a big heart and I'm nice - and I like to eat.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: People ask 'do you make a conscious effort not to swear?' - if you're doing silly stuff you're not tempted to put swearing in. All the comics from my childhood, who were funny without swearing, were the people that influenced me. What I do is quite traditional anyway.
author: Tim Vine

quote: My parents are both very funny but they're also relatively soft-spoken, normal human beings while I'm just a lunatic. I don't know where this loud, ballsy, hammy ridiculousness came from. I'm just glad I followed my goals and my parents did too. It's not like we even had a plan when I dragged my mom to Los Angeles.
author: Emma Stone

quote: I heard that people were really interested in the new haircut, which I think is so funny. Great haircut, I really like it. It goes great with the time period. And I was super, super, super-happy to have my bangs swept to the side rather than straight in front of me, which I dealt with for three seasons. I'm very, very much done with that.
author: Elisabeth Moss

quote: Thing is, I'm a funny actor, but I'm not good at being funny. I'm going to ramble for a second: I'm an actor who can make things funny in the moment, like in stakes or in circumstances or out of character.
author: Matthew Lillard

quote: As soon as you are trying to be funny or dramatic, that's when things start feeling fake and boring.
author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: My grandchildren are fabulous and funny.
author: Erica Jong

quote: I love Charlie, Billy Burke's character. Writing for him is so spectacular, he's so funny and wry and every scene he's in he just takes. There's a scene in 'Eclipse' where Bella tells him she's a virgin, and it's the funniest, most awkward scene I've ever seen on film.
author: Melissa Rosenberg

quote: Being funny, it turns out, is like being a bank. It's a confidence trick. As long as everyone believes in you, you are fine.
author: Evan Davis

quote: It's funny how I use social media because I don't use it to promote my restaurants that much. I use it for social issues and I think that's what it's for. I do a few things - I mess around with music a lot because that's a passion of mine. If something strikes me and I want to share it, I do.
author: Tom Colicchio

quote: When I was in high school I used to sit by myself in the cafeteria - not necessarily by choice - but I thought it was funny to talk to people that weren't there.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: There are just so many funny kids and teenagers. They're just not aware of how funny they are.
author: Vanessa Bayer

quote: I've never been to a dinner party where everyone at the dinner table didn't say something funny.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: I don't think I am particularly funny. In fact, I know I'm not.
author: Jeremy Clarkson

quote: The funny thing is that my husband couldn't be sweeter. He looks like this bad boy. He's got tattoos and earrings and a mohawk, but when you talk to him and he's around you, he's such a gentleman. He holds doors for ladies. He pulls out chairs. He cooks. He cleans.
author: Malin Akerman

quote: The funny guy doesn't get the girl until later in life. High school, college, everyone still wants the brooding, dangerous guy you shouldn't have.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: My kind of wanting to be funny didn't come from need, necessarily. The closest I can analyze it is that it was an easy way to make friends, I found out. It was just a great kind of social tool.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: To handle that stardom, the red carpets, the photo shoots, people all of a sudden recognizing you and following you in everyday life, it's a bit weird. It's strange, and it can have funny effects on you in terms of do you like it or don't you like it. Some people run away from it, some people embrace it; I found a good middle ground.
author: Roger Federer

quote: It's funny how the ruthless, murderous gangster has really been romanticized by the media. I mean, I grew up watching the 'Godfathers' and 'Scarface,' and they were the coolest. They're just really interesting stories with great characters. They're rock stars.
author: Elena Satine

quote: I don't feel that I'm explaining the world or teaching people anything. And I'm not trying to be a mirror, showing them what's really going on the world. All I'm trying to do is think of stuff that's funny, just like when I'm kidding around with my friends.
author: Steven Wright

quote: When I was a kid, I never did funny things to get attention. I was never a funny person. I was never, like, 'Oh, wow. I could say this some day on stage.'
author: Steven Wright

quote: Latinos, Asians, African-Americans, women - we're all trying to find our place in this world of cinema and television and theater. And the great thing with comedy is that most of the time, you could be orange. It doesn't matter, as long you're funny.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: The funny thing is that I feel close to all my characters. Deep, deep inside them all.
author: Paul Auster

quote: I've had an experience through music that has touched almost every part of me. It educated me in ways that I didn't get educated in school. So we try to lay on a bit of that, through being funny, being serious, playing hard.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: I tweet from bed. I love it because it's so quick. And it's funny. But it also leaves a lot of room for error because new people don't sense the sarcasm - there's no sarcasm font.
author: Christine Teigen

quote: As a kid, I thought of myself as a funny person who secretly wanted to be serious, but now I think maybe I'm a serious person who secretly wants to be funny.
author: Noah Baumbach

quote: Being funny, in some ways, is about being connected to psychology.
author: Noah Baumbach

quote: When I play discos in Belfast or freshers' week in Oxford, there are 1,800 kids dressed as me. It's odd, it's funny, and it pays really well.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: I do keep getting these bad girl roles. The funny thing is that, honestly, I don't think I'm believable as these aristocratic mean girls. But I do love playing them.
author: Katie McGrath

quote: If you're OK with being clumsy, it's funny. But if you are super embarrassed, people are going to laugh at you.
author: Leo Howard

quote: Unless someone wants to look funny, I'll not recommend anyone to copy my bowling action. But on a serious note, with the confidence that I have got from the amount of runs I have been scoring, when I'm thrown the ball to bowl, I am pretty sure of what I have to do. I may not be the most attractive to watch while bowling, but I can be effective.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: I wasn't the class clown. I wasn't that obvious. There would be a circle of guys, and they're watching the class clown. And I'm standing in the back, and I turn to the guy next to me and I say something funny to him, and he starts to laugh. And the guy next to him says, 'What did he say?'
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Funny thing is that the poorer people are, the more generous they seem to be.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: You just suddenly think that there's something quite childish about acting. Basically, it's pretending, isn't it? It's good fun and I enjoy it, but it's a funny way of making a living, particularly when you make a very good wage, as I've been fortunate enough to do.
author: Kevin Whately

quote: I am interested in shows that are not out-and-out gag fests: you see the truth of a broken heart behind them. That is what life is like: it's really funny, you see funny things as soon as you step out of the room, but underneath that is a whole bag of broken hearts. It's that real pain and that real hilarity that makes life so intriguing.
author: Tamsin Greig

quote: The inspiration for my Vines comes from thinking about funny and relatable experiences from my daily life.
author: Lele Pons

quote: Objectifying is kind of a funny thing. Art is objectification, all art, because you're taking someone and making them into an object. But people can also talk back more to you when you're sketching them. They can look at you and say, 'Oh man, you got me wrong.'
author: Molly Crabapple

quote: There's a difference between being a comic and a comedian. A comic is a guy who says funny things, and a comedian is a guy who says things funny, and he has a style and point of view that will last much longer.
author: Milton Berle

quote: You know what's funny is, when I made 'Saw,' I got accused of being a fascist; when I made 'Insidious,' I got accused of being godless, and now I made the 'Conjuring' films, and I'm accused of being too much God.
author: James Wan

quote: It is funny to me that because I can run, because I'm athletic, people tend to see that as my only asset.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: All I know how to do is take what's on my mind and spit it out funny. I don't know what else I could do besides comedy.
author: Ron White

quote: It's funny - almost every comedian that I started out with moved to L.A., except for my two friends Hannibal Buress and Amy Schumer. And my two friends that are doing the best in comedy, the most successful friends I have, are Hannibal Buress and Amy Schumer.
author: Eric Andre

quote: I've always liked older women. One sad thing about being my age is that there are no older women. I used to amuse my mother's friends even at five or six with witty turns of phrase. Somehow, I just knew how to be funny.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: It's funny how all of this has worked out - I wasn't popular in high school, but now every drunken guy in the United States wants to be my pal. They all want to buy me a shot, and pretty soon I'm throwing up.
author: Jimmy Kimmel

quote: Funny is funny is funny.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Here's the thing - I'm single, I haven't been married, I don't have kids yet. If I do have kids I would be interested to see them in my life, so here's a movie for kids and I'm in there and I'm supposed to be kind of funny for kids.
author: Garry Shandling

quote: A man's got to take a lot of punishment to write a really funny book.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: With improv, it's a combination of listening and not trying to be funny.
author: Kristen Wiig

quote: The middle class is so funny, it's the class I know best, and it's the class where you find the most pretension, so that's what makes the middle classes so funny.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: I always just wanted to be funny. I never really planned to be scary.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: I've worked a lot with Noah Baumbach, and he doesn't make it easy to like his characters, but the stories are funny and witty and there's an edge to that kind of humanity.
author: Ciaran Hinds

quote: Viral videos aren't just about being funny. They're about identity creation.
author: Ricky Van Veen

quote: Some people say funny things, but I say things funny.
author: Don Rickles

quote: It would be pretty funny to see a Beverly Hills white girl with mad rap skills.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: I'm spending a year dead for tax reasons.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: You can always tell when a man's well informed. His views are pretty much like your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: When you're out of sight for as long as I was, there's a funny feeling of betrayal that comes over people when they see you again.
author: Esther Williams

quote: I think it's harder to go from comedy to drama than from drama to comedy. Seeing you dramatic all the time, they crave to see you being silly or funny. But, seeing you in comedy all the time, it's hard to see that person go be serious, for some reason.
author: Evan Peters

quote: I don't know. I think it's funny! I think it's funny! I go, what? It's so absurd. I'm alone.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: I don't know why I get away with some things. But I'm not a misogynistic, racist person. Yet I do find those jokes funny, so I say them. And I try to say everything kind of in a good spirit.
author: Daniel Tosh

quote: I'm an optimist, but an optimist who carries a raincoat.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: If I studied all my life, I couldn't think up half the number of funny things passed in one session of congress.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I guess when I think about it, one of the things I like to dramatise, and what is sometimes funny, is someone coming unglued. I don't consider myself someone who is making the argument that I support these choices. I just think it can be funny.
author: Wes Anderson

quote: I'm on so late I'm definitely the last seconds of anyone's attention. So I just want to give them something dumb to laugh at, so they go, 'That's funny,' then fall asleep.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Inappropriateness is funny to me. Rudeness is hilarious.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: You're unlikely to discover something new without a lot of practice on old stuff, but further, you should get a heck of a lot of fun out of working out funny relations and interesting things.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Never take a solemn oath. People think you mean it.
author: Norman Douglas

quote: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I guess when you turn off the main road, you have to be prepared to see some funny houses.
author: Stephen King

quote: A two-year-old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I see fighters make funny videos about me and stick them on Facebook and get 20 likes. When I make a video, I sell it to Fox and make seven figures. That's the difference.
author: Conor McGregor

quote: Everything that used to be a sin is now a disease.
author: Bill Maher

quote: I don't follow anything blindly. I have to know the entire thing, if I have to get in to it. It might sound funny to you, but it's like using English language. I use an English word only when I know its meaning and understand its connotation. You won't hear me say, 'What's up, dude' or anything like that just for the heck of it.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: All the candy corn that was ever made was made in 1911.
author: Lewis Black

quote: I don't think I would do a straight late-night talk show, like a 'Tonight Show' kind of thing. But I'm open to whatever is done well. I don't have any agenda. I'm not like Fugazi - I'm not trying to be just so punk rock until I die. Whatever is funny is good.
author: Eric Andre

quote: The tax collector must love poor people, he's creating so many of them.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: Being a funny person does an awful lot of things to you. You feel that you mustn't get serious with people. They don't expect it from you, and they don't want to see it. You're not entitled to be serious, you're a clown.
author: Fanny Brice

quote: There's a darkness under 'The Hangover' because ultimately there's a missing person and it's not really that funny. There's a sort of darkness under it that I love, and still people are laughing as hard if not harder than they did in 'Old School.'
author: Todd Phillips

quote: Memories are doing funny things to us.
author: Milos Forman

quote: I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I spent a year in that town, one Sunday.
author: George Burns

quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I think Irish women are strong as horses, incredibly loyal and for the most part, funny, witty, bright and optimistic in the face of devastating reality.
author: Fionnula Flanagan

quote: I consider that a man's brain originally is like a little empty attic, and you have to stock it with such furniture as you choose.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: If it's the Psychic Network why do they need a phone number?
author: Robin Williams

quote: I'd rather not have a moment when I'm known for my looks being funny and interesting lasts longer.
author: Kelly Ripa

quote: It's obviously funny to be a meme, so I could be down with it in that regard, but it also belittles one's art.
author: Grimes

quote: Films are big hits when they touch a lot of people. Things are not funny in a vacuum, they're funny because we respond to some personal dislocation, some embarrassment, some humiliation, some pain we've suffered, or some desire we have.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: When I turned about 12 or 13, I realised that being funny wasn't about remembering jokes. It was about creating them.
author: Paul Merton

quote: Maybe people don't see me as believable playing a person of today. I guess I'm just more realistic in a corset and funny hairstyles.
author: Katie McGrath

quote: Progress might have been alright once, but it has gone on too long.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: You know, you can touch a stick of dynamite, but if you touch a venomous snake it'll turn around and bite you and kill you so fast it's not even funny.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: In comic strips, the person on the left always speaks first.
author: George Carlin

quote: Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you she is after your barn.
author: Hesiod

quote: A lot of baby boomers are baby bongers.
author: Kevin Nealon

quote: Being a stand-up is my mission in life; it's my passion. My ongoing goal is to simply be funny, on my own, in front of a roomful of strangers.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My mum passing away wasn't funny, but that funeral and what I went through, the things that happened, looking back at it, there were funny moments. You have to be strong enough to look back at it, to sit and assess the situation.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: Being a humorist is not a voluntary thing. You can tell this because in a situation where saying a funny thing will cause a lot of trouble, a humorist will still say the funny thing. No matter how inappropriate.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The men I idolized built their bodies and became somebody - like Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger - and I thought, 'That can be me.' So I started working out. The funny thing is I didn't realize back then that I was having a defining moment.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Whatever is funny is subversive, every joke is ultimately a custard pie... a dirty joke is a sort of mental rebellion.
author: George Orwell

quote: I like drama. I love being in a drama where I get to be the funny guy. That's what I really love the most.
author: John Leguizamo

quote: It's funny the way most people love the dead. Once you are dead, you are made for life.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: There's also a certain rhythm to the way Jews talk that might be funny.
author: Larry David

quote: I get asked, 'Who would you really like to work with?' I'm already working with them. Smart, talented, funny people, good musicians, an extended family, good friends.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: Just telling the facts are no longer enough. You now have to be persuasive, charismatic, interesting, and funny. Just telling people things isn't enough anymore.
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: Funny is funny. I dare anyone to look at Tim Conway and Harvey Korman doing the dentist sketch, which is more than 40 years old, and not scream with laughter.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Television has brought back murder into the home - where it belongs.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: What do I know of man's destiny? I could tell you more about radishes.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Who picks your clothes - Stevie Wonder?
author: Don Rickles

quote: I never drink water because of the disgusting things that fish do in it.
author: Unknown

quote: I love things made out of animals. It's just so funny to think of someone saying, 'I need a letter opener. I guess I'll have to kill a deer.
author: David Sedaris

quote: I love readings and my readers, but the din of voices of the audience gives me stage fright, and the din of voices inside whisper that I am a fraud, and that the jig is up. Surely someone will rise up from the audience and say out loud that not only am I not funny and helpful, but I'm annoying, and a phony.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: I never liked apples. In fact, when I was a little girl, my mom wanted to give me apples in my lunch box and I would ask for green peppers. So bizarre... It's funny - I don't have an apple a day, but I can say that I have a few a week.
author: Lana Parrilla

quote: The funny thing is, I've never really hurt myself in an action movie. I've done 'Wanted,' 'X-Men,' 'Welcome To The Punch,' even 'Trance' to a certain extent has little bits of action and stuff, but I've never really hurt myself at all - not even like a sprained ankle.
author: James McAvoy

quote: Isn't it funny how babies laugh a lot? I read a toddler, a young child laughs 300 times a day. The average adult laughs, like, four times a day. God put it in them. He put the laugh in us, but I think sometimes we let life get us down, you know, have bad breaks, and we lose our breaks.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Almost anything can be funny if said the right way - but it has to be said the right way.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: I do not think that obsession is funny or that not being able to stop one's intensity is funny.
author: Jim Dine

quote: Well in the book Carrie was my alter ego. In real life, Sarah Jessica and I don't look anything alike. But people do say that we sound alike. Sarah Jessica is an adorable girl and she is very funny.
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: It's funny because it's funny.
author: David Spade

quote: I could party in a cardboard box with people who are funny and don't care. For me, it's really about who I surround myself with, so I just try to always be with hilarious people.
author: Kesha

quote: I think there have always been funny women, from Carol Burnett to Joan Rivers. When the audience sees a woman, they innately know she's worked twice as hard to get there, she's had to prove that she can be the leader, first, and then be funny on top of it. She has to emit a confidence that she's in control.
author: Wendy Liebman

quote: My father was a really funny guy. He lived a good long life. And he was the reason I wanted to be funny and become a comedian and a comedy writer, so to say that he's somewhat of a mythic figure in my life would be an understatement.
author: Carol Leifer

quote: I don't mean to be funny.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I remember straightening my hair because I wanted to be like everybody else, and now the fact that anybody would emulate what I do? It's just funny.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: It's funny, in literature no one ever goes to the lavatory.
author: Tom Baker

quote: I can be dramatic. I can be funny. I can be sexy. I can be sad. I can be glad.
author: Kimberly Elise

quote: It's funny, because there are so many stereotypes out there about actors and movie stars in general, but I've had a great opportunity to meet a lot of them, and maybe it's just because they don't behave that way around me, but I rarely see that kind of abuse of power.
author: Ryan Reynolds

quote: I'm very lighthearted, outgoing, friendly, and funny, so I like to try new things.
author: Chandler Parsons

quote: I try to be funny and not ignorant.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: There's a fine line between angry and grumpy. Angry isn't nice, but grumpy is funny.
author: Rick Wakeman

quote: Eyebrows are really important because they structure the face. In school it was funny because I was always the one walking around with tweezers plucking my girlfriends' eyebrows. I was really good; eyebrow tweezing runs in my family - my mother used to do mine, and I picked it up.
author: Rita Ora

quote: Most of my show is true; like, 90% of everything I say on stage is true. I just have to find the way to make it funny - that's the difficult thing.
author: Trevor Noah

quote: The thing I most hate about the Left is that they want to stop us laughing - to prescribe which jokes are OK and which are not OK to make in public and to draw artificial lines around certain subjects. I find all sorts of inappropriate things funny.
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: A reputation takes years and years and years to build, and it takes one press of a button to ruin it. Don't let that happen to you. You've done so much work; you've put in so much effort. Don't let one moment ruin your entire life because you wanted to be funny or you were mad or because you had a mood.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: I'm a prankster, so some of the - you know, I like a good joke. I think when it's funny, it's funny.
author: Sean Spicer

quote: Certainly there are things in life that money can't buy, but it's very funny - Did you ever try buying them without money?
author: Ogden Nash

quote: I was the kid next door's imaginary friend.
author: Emo Philips

quote: With my boyfriend, we can make sexist jokes to each other because we know it's absolutely not true. If I get home from a long day and he says: 'Go on, get in the kitchen,' it's funny because we know it's not our lives.
author: Emily Browning

quote: It's grueling never knowing if the audience is going to think you're funny. It's soul-destroying when they don't laugh.
author: Vince Vaughn

quote: It's funny how God will just keep using you, and our motto around our family forever has been, 'Just let Him use you.'
author: Kim Fields

quote: It's funny how seeing a love story never gets boring, because it's the dream, isn't it? It's the dream to have a true connection with another human being.
author: Felicity Jones

quote: As far as I'm concerned, 'whom' is a word that was invented to make everyone sound like a butler.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: I think they should have a Barbie with a buzz cut.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: California is a fine place to live - if you happen to be an orange.
author: Fred Allen

quote: He was like a cock who thought the sun had risen to hear him crow.
author: George Eliot

quote: An optimist is a fellow who believes a housefly is looking for a way to get out.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Say what you will about the ten commandments, you must always come back to the pleasant fact that there are only ten of them.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: It is even harder for the average ape to believe that he has descended from man.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The reason there are two senators for each state is so that one can be the designated driver.
author: Jay Leno

quote: Every man's dream is to be able to sink into the arms of a woman without also falling into her hands.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: You see much more of your children once they leave home.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: My uncle Sammy was an angry man. He had printed on his tombstone: What are you looking at?
author: Margaret Smith

quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry.
author: O. Henry

quote: Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Every man has a sane spot somewhere.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I never liked you, and I always will.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Include me out.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Fashions have done more harm than revolutions.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The reward of energy, enterprise and thrift is taxes.
author: William Feather

quote: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear.
author: Woody Allen

quote: The day I made that statement, about the inventing the internet, I was tired because I'd been up all night inventing the Camcorder.
author: Al Gore

quote: So, where's the Cannes Film Festival being held this year?
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: Me carrying a briefcase is like a hotdog wearing earrings.
author: Sparky Anderson

quote: My mother was against me being an actress - until I introduced her to Frank Sinatra.
author: Angie Dickinson

quote: Food, love, career, and mothers, the four major guilt groups.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: Defy your own group. Rebel against yourself.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: I was born in very sorry circumstances. Both of my parents were very sorry.
author: Norman Wisdom

quote: It is easy for me to love myself, but for ladies to do it is another question altogether.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: I'd never been in play long enough for the flowers to die in the dressing room.
author: Mercedes McCambridge

quote: I was sleeping the other night, alone, thanks to the exterminator.
author: Emo Philips

quote: God writes a lot of comedy... the trouble is, he's stuck with so many bad actors who don't know how to play funny.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: It's funny how sometimes how the public some people think I was born like this. That I maybe I sleep and I do big muscle, but its a lot of work to look like this and to be in this kind of condition.
author: Lou Ferrigno

quote: I can do comedy, so people want me to do that, but the other side of comedy is depression. Deep, deep depression is the flip side of comedy. Casting agents don't realize it but in order to be funny you have to have that other side.
author: Parker Posey

quote: In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.
author: Rosie Perez

quote: Well, I'm not afraid to say something if I think it's funny, even if it's harsh or racist.
author: Sarah Silverman

quote: I write funny. If I can make my wife laugh, I know I'm on the right track. But yes, I don't like to get Maudlin. And I have a tendency towards it.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: I have no agenda except to be funny. Neither I or the writers profess to offer any worldly wisdom.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Half of the great comedians I've had in my shows and that I paid a lot of money to and who made my customers shriek were not only not funny to me, but I couldn't understand why they were funny to anybody.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: People don't realize that I'm really funny and I'm an excellent bridge player.
author: Sheryl Crow

quote: You gotta keep the funny intact.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: One thing the blues ain't, is funny.
author: Stephen Stills

quote: We have never been strictly political, only strictly funny.
author: Adrian Edmondson

quote: About 100 things that your kid will do that will surprise you and break your heart and it will be a combination of fact based therapy, medically advised kinds of passages accompanied by celebrity anecdotes and just some funny stuff to lighten the load.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: I wasn't very funny or flashy, I was kind of boring.
author: Katie Holmes

quote: But I think Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang really got that thing where, if a movie reads really funny and then has some dramatic or violent or sinister stuff in it, you can't forget that primarily it has to be even funnier than you read it or that other stuff doesn't work.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: When I tell people I'm a comedian they say, 'Oh, are you funny?' I say, 'No, it's not that kind of comedy.'
author: Susan Sarandon

quote: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?
author: Andy Warhol

quote: I don't need somebody behind a desk to tell me what a marketing survey says is funny. I got 3 million miles and 70,000 tickets sold, telling me that I know how to make people laugh.
author: D. L. Hughley

quote: Eddie Drake is sort of this loose cannon, funny, edgy guy, who has this really foolish, foolish mustache.
author: Lee Tergesen

quote: Steve Martin is one of the most intelligent, well-read human beings that I've ever come across. He is equally as funny off screen as he is on. But he also has a very intellectual side, and he's a really nice human being. We actually become good friends.
author: Anthony LaPaglia

quote: I had gotten to a place where I truly believed everything I was called: 'not sexy,' 'not funny,' 'too intense,' desperate.' All those labels they gave me, I took them because there wasn't a trace of my true self left.
author: Naomi Watts

quote: I wanted to be that quirky girl who writes funny songs that still have meaning.
author: Katy Perry

quote: There are a lot of funny people and a lot of unfunny people. Some of them are women and some of them are dudes.
author: Lake Bell

quote: We've seen some insane signs: 'Is that a loaf of bread in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me?' Funny stuff along those lines. Very original. One just said, 'I will do unspeakable things.' I thought that was very interesting - and mildly terrifying!
author: Josh Hutcherson

quote: I put on a big show when I write something I think is funny.
author: Judd Apatow

quote: I tend to play characters that I can infuse with certain kinds of humour. Even the baddest guy can be funny in his own particular way. I want the audience to engage with the character on some deeper level so that they leave the cinema still thinking about him.
author: Samuel L. Jackson

quote: It's funny - in elementary school, I went by Amber. I never liked Tiffani.
author: Tiffani Thiessen

quote: I think I've got a funny face.
author: Dominic West

quote: I mean, I'm married first of all to one of, if not the most wonderful women in the world. She is everything - funny, attractive, hard-working, she has integrity, she loves me to bits.
author: Seal

quote: You know being relevant or coming up with something interesting, funny to say about what's current is just as hard as it might ever be depending on the serendipity of it all.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: I turned down 'Some Like It Hot.' See how smart I am? I felt I couldn't bring anything funny to it. The outfit was funny. I don't need to compete with the wardrobe.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: I don't really need to be dirty to be funny.
author: Jimmy Kimmel

quote: I never know when I am being funny, and the other way too. I don't think you can think about that. I don't think you can try to be funny. Some people are just funny.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: Funny enough, if you are looking at people these days who are putting Botox in their face and getting all sorts of plastic surgery, we look at them and go, I can tell you've had Botox. I can tell you've had plastic surgery. You look really strange to me. But no one's saying anything. We're just accepting the fact that they're strange-looking.
author: Guy Pearce

quote: It is funny what a year can do.
author: Victor Cruz

quote: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: There's always something funny about men chasing women.
author: David Spade

quote: I'm never afraid to try something if I think it's funny. And I know I'll regret it if I don't.
author: Seann William Scott

quote: If Joy Behar or Sherri Shepherd was a dude, they'd be off TV. They're not funny enough for dudes. What if Roseanne Barr was a dude? Think we'd know who she was?
author: Adam Carolla

quote: Being mean just for being mean's sake isn't funny.
author: Kaitlin Olson

quote: Gotta stay in the gym, stay funny, stay sharp. I just love working.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: I think there's something in the fact that it's hard to be good looking and funny. You have to have an oddball quality people have to sympathise with you to find you funny.
author: Chris O'Dowd

quote: That's a funny thing, fame. People definitely do treat you differently. When you begin to be successful, people say, 'Don't go changing.' Well, that's easy to say, but the fact is, you don't change at all - other people do.
author: Jonathan Rhys Meyers

quote: I think that 'Hangover II' is as funny as 'The Hangover I,' honest to God, but I think that it's a little bit darker, and the stakes are a little bit higher.
author: Todd Phillips

quote: It's funny when you know you're playing two characters and you're aware of how you have to play each one into your performance of the other. You're constantly at the back of your mind thinking and it all gets a bit confusing.
author: Jamie Dornan

quote: I would love to write a mystery - a romantic, funny mystery.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: A lot of comedies are based on the reaction shot. You have one person doing something stupid and one person is generally the straight man, and the laughs generally come on the reaction of the straight man to the funny thing the other person has done.
author: Richard Ayoade

quote: I always thought 'chick lit' meant third-person contemporary funny novels, dealing with issues of the day. I mean, it's not the ideal term; when I'm asked to describe what I do, I say I write romantic comedies, cause that's what I feel they are. But I'm quite pragmatic.
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: Being effective at social media, whether for business or personal use, means capturing people who have short attention spans. They're only a click away from a picture of a funny cat, so you have to make your thing more compelling than that cat. And that can be a high bar.
author: Alexis Ohanian

quote: You know, what's funny to one person is not at all to someone else.
author: Steve Carell

quote: I always find it funny when I watch actors talking about, 'I chose to do this part.' A lot of times it's 'you're lucky to get the job.' We're like, 'Thank you so much.'
author: Lucy Punch

quote: Lot of ugly funny dudes end up with some pretty gorgeous women. Women are much deeper than us in choosing a mate - they see in the long term.
author: Patton Oswalt

quote: Yes, we do defend our office as we do defend our homes. This is a constitutional right everybody has, and nothing's funny about that. The only reason they get mad at the Black Panther Party when you do it is for the simple reason that we're political.
author: Fred Hampton

quote: Children are the most honest critics. They will say 'You're funny', but also 'You're pathetic - go away.'
author: Dylan Moran

quote: I find being funny very hard work. I am always asked about it, and I feel guilty saying that, but it's the truth. I love my work, but it ain't easy.
author: Madeline Kahn

quote: I think stutterers are funny. And I know it's rude and politically incorrect to laugh at stutterers. But I think it is okay because I know why they're funny. They make people nervous. People think, when on earth are they going to get the word out, so they start laughing out of their own nervousness.
author: James Earl Jones

quote: What bothers most critics of my work is the goofiness. One reviewer said I need to make up my mind if want to be funny or serious. My response is that I will make up my mind when God does, because life is a commingling of the sacred and the profane, good and evil. To try and separate them is fallacy.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: If something is shocking without being funny it's hard to justify.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: On 'The Simpsons,' I will say that we definitely like to comment on what's going on in the world, and we try to be funny. If we can figure out a way of being funny about it, then we've gone part of the way of accomplishing our task.
author: Matt Groening

quote: I think Amy Poehler and Tina Fey have done so much for women in comedy in the sense that they've normalized it. You don't think, 'I'm going to watch that comedy starring a woman,' you think, 'I'm going to watch that funny show.' They refuse to play the foils for men, or be reduced to the butt of every joke, and I love that about both of them.
author: Tatiana Maslany

quote: I grew up in a time when women didn't really do comedy. You had to be homely, overweight, an old maid, all that. You had to play a stereotype, because very attractive women were not supposed to be funny - because it's powerful; it's a threat.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Someone said to me at a party once, 'Oh, yeah, you're a comedian? Then how come you're not funny now?' And I just wanted to say, 'Well, I'm just going to take this conversation we're having and then repeat that to strangers, and then that's the joke. You're the joke later.'
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: My ideal prom date would have to be cute, funny, sweet, nice.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: I think it would be funny for people to read in obituaries of me that my major contribution to the arts was the popularization of the phrases 'neutral facial expression' and 'screaming in agony.'
author: Tao Lin

quote: I get a kick out of people saying I was funny.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: As a youngster, my mother and father always drilled into my head having something to fall back on. My father was kind of funny. I'd score 40 points. I'd come home and say, 'Look dad, I scored 40.' He'd never have a smile on his face. He'd be like, 'I saw that move you did. What if you'd hurt your knee?'
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: I remember people saying: 'You look funny, your hair is so black, you have a flat nose,' but I didn't think of it being racism, and I still don't. But there was a sense of difference, of being an outsider.
author: Sadie Jones

quote: You shouldn't get too close to the truth, because then maybe you stop being funny.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: I know that I'm going to die and that you're going to die. I can't do anything about that. But I can explore it through a metaphor and make a kind of funny, dark story about it, and in doing so, really exhaust and research as many aspects of it as I can imagine. And in a way, that does give me some closure.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: I've always surrounded myself with funny people.
author: Leslie Mann

quote: I try to write stories that are thrilling and full of mystery and funny all at the same time, stories that raise moral questions but come up with very few moral answers, stories that emotionally touch readers through the characters.
author: William Lashner

quote: I think funny is just the foundation. I don't really think, to some extent, funny is the absolute most important thing. It should also communicate some idea through the medium of cartooning. Just to be funny is... You know what, the things that you laugh hardest at aren't cartoons.
author: Robert Mankoff

quote: Every girls' night needs a funny movie and a good conversation about guys! My friends and I also love picking outfits out for each other to try on at slumber parties. It's so fun.
author: Jennette McCurdy

quote: When I was right out of college, I felt competitive with some of the guys in my class over career stuff. It's funny now to think about it - that a friend getting a job or something had anything to do with me... I think that my relationship with my wife has played a pivotal role in the chilling out of Aaron.
author: Aaron Staton

quote: I always have a funny story at communion time that underscores that no one is perfect, and that communion is not for perfect people but for hungry people.
author: Greg Boyle

quote: I love to swim. When I jump in the water, I feel like I'm 12 years old again. It's really funny how it does that to me.
author: Summer Sanders

quote: When Jonathan Winters died, it was like, 'Oh, man!' I knew he was frail, but I always thought he was going to last longer. I knew him as being really funny, but at the same time, he had a dark side.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I was a good student until I turned 15. Then, all of a sudden, it didn't matter to me anymore. Isn't that funny. I don't want to go to college. I always knew that. But it's hard. My friends are going, and I feel a little left behind.
author: Clara Mamet

quote: The gummy bears tattoo was my idea. It's my son's favorite candy. The sketch was my other son's idea. It's a self-portrait of himself. I just showed the artist his sketch and had him tattoo it on my forearm. It looks like a stick person with big hair. It's pretty funny.
author: Prince Fielder

quote: The real world has always been far more exciting and funny and dangerous to me than anything somebody could conjure up sitting in front of a computer.
author: Tony Scott

quote: I love playing smart and tough and having funny lines.
author: Jane Elliot

quote: There are a lot of funny things that happen in one's life.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I love my brothers' kids. It's funny - as an uncle, you become so protective of them.
author: Liam Hemsworth

quote: The human brain is a funny thing: it's very susceptible to tempo and melody. You put the right words to it, and it becomes very influential.
author: Ray Stevens

quote: It's funny how you get a bit older and become more accepting of things. When you're in your twenties, you're skeptical of everything. I definitely felt like that.
author: Jamie Dornan

quote: My job is to bring the tickle. I know what's funny.
author: Leslie Jones

quote: I make funny videos of me playing video games, and I share those moments.
author: PewDiePie

quote: I'm screamingly funny, you know, I really am in the books. And that helps because I'm funnier than a lot of people, I think, and that's appreciated by young people.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Rapping can be repetition sometimes. Sometimes you gotta highlight your words in a certain kind of way. So I always was a fan of sing-rapping. It was always funny to me a little bit, and I think that being funny and being able to laugh, even at yourself, is a form of flattery.
author: ASAP Ferg

quote: I seem to get into situations that make people laugh, but I don't consider myself that funny of a person. I'm not witty. I'm kind of slow in conversations. I'm not that articulate with jokes. The first time I made stuff and screened it for an audience, I was surprised what people were laughing at.
author: Nathan Fielder

quote: I always believe that funny is serious and serious is funny. You don't really need a distinction between them.
author: Trevor Noah

quote: Sometimes I'm really funny, sometimes I'm quiet, sometimes I'm shy, but I'm constantly changing.
author: Elle King

quote: There are precedents for what happens when societies allow the divide between rich and poor to get so huge that it stops being funny and starts becoming a sick, blood-boiling joke. If you had a Tardis, you could go back to 1917 and ask the Russian royal family how it was all going.
author: John Niven

quote: When it comes down to it, glam rock was all very amusing. At the time, it was funny, then a few years later it became sort of serious-looking and a bit foreboding.
author: David Bowie

quote: I did feel funny about being fair and having red hair and freckles. I did not like that because I grew up in a neighbourhood where no one had red hair. I felt very conspicuous but not in a nice way.
author: Patti Scialfa

quote: It's funny: most people who recognize me on the subway and stuff - it's much more they think of me as a funny guy. I get much more of people telling me how much I make them laugh, actually. Which is nice.
author: Paul Giamatti

quote: In person, my father is so friendly, so considerate, so funny, and so real. I have admired my father all of my life, and I love him with all my heart.
author: Tiffany Trump

quote: I don't argue with people... if they say I'm not funny, they're right, for them.
author: Hannibal Buress

quote: If you look at shows like 'Def Comedy Jam' in its heyday, there were so many really funny, talented black comics that never would have gotten on that show because they just weren't doing comedy that fit that mold.
author: Aisha Tyler

quote: I feel like, if there's an elephant in the room, I'd really like to start off by introducing the elephant in the room. And sometimes it's funny.
author: Louis Theroux

quote: I'm going to take this God-given gift of being funny, and I'm going to spread it out like peanut butter on everything I do.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: I auditioned for a movie recently, and when I went in, the producer said he'd told one of its stars, Naomi Watts, that he was auditioning me, and she'd said, 'She's so funny; she's a great actress - you should hire her.' What a lovely, kind, and supportive thing to do for another woman.
author: Isla Fisher

quote: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say it at all. And if you do have to say it, make it really funny so I can screenshot it and save it for later.
author: Sabrina Carpenter

quote: I think politics is extremely funny in and of itself.
author: Jesse Watters

quote: It's funny how God will change your plans for you when he's ready.
author: Brett Young

quote: My friend and I founded the New York Arab-American Comedy Festival to counter the negative images of Arabs in media. And we always made sure that the comedy came first. So we weren't a bunch of Arabs trying to be funny. We were a bunch of comedians who just happened to be of Arab heritage.
author: Maysoon Zayid

quote: We spend a lot of time on Skype and other video interviews, and it's funny how many people will prepare for a Skype interview by wearing a formal suit jacket with pajama pants on the bottom. Then suddenly, someone is at the door, and you have to get up, and you realize you're wearing reindeer boxers. Just put pants on.
author: Kathryn Minshew

quote: I want to give kids that fall-off-the-bed-laughing feeling. Either that, or the sixth-grade feeling that life is hard - sometimes unbearably hard - and it is ultimately about death. But in the meantime, life can be really funny, too.
author: Kate Klise

quote: The music industry is really funny, when you have a hit record, everyone knows who are you, everyone wants to do duets with you, then if you have a miss, people suffer from amnesia.
author: Seal

quote: I had an idea of what I thought was funny. It's kind of based on how I am.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: But you can't focus on things that matter if all you've been is asleep for forty years. Funny how sleep rhymes with sheep. You know.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: The word 'funny' is a bit like the word 'love' - we don't have enough words to describe the many varieties.
author: George Saunders

quote: A lot of modern comedies are difficult to watch too, because they're so ironic and so detached and so quote-unquote clever. They kind of keep you at arm's length. They can be really funny, but they're not really nourishing.
author: Ty Burrell

quote: I'd love to do a comedy. I'm terrified of comedy. I don't think I'm funny, but I guess that's why it's so thrilling.
author: Jared Padalecki

quote: There is nothing funny about a well-adjusted, intelligent person making the right choices.
author: Tim Heidecker

quote: Like almost everyone who uses e-mail, I receive a ton of spam every day. Much of it offers to help me get out of debt or get rich quick. It would be funny if it weren't so exciting.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: When I'm on stage, it's really intense. My mind is going a million miles an hour, trying to remember my act, trying to say it all the right way. It's funny how different it looks and how it's happening. There are three Fellini circuses in my head, and outwardly it looks like I'm going to get a bagel.
author: Steven Wright

quote: You know how old I am? I'm so old, I remember when Letterman used to be funny and it was presidents who were serious. That's how old I am.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: The superfluous, a very necessary thing.
author: Voltaire

quote: It's funny how you never think about the women you've had. It's always the ones who get away that you can't forget.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: I'm odd looking. Sometimes I think I look like a funny muppet.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Believe it or not, I make myself laugh. Sometimes when I have thoughts or say some things that are funny, it just makes me laugh, and I don't mind laughing at it before you guys do.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: The funny thing is people won't let me pay for things. I'll be in a restaurant and the manager will say, 'Oh no, it's on the house.'
author: Richard Branson

quote: I never expected to see the day when girls would get sunburned in the places they now do.
author: Will Rogers

quote: It is not funny that anything else should fall down only that a man should fall down. Why do we laugh? Because it is a gravely religious matter: it is the Fall of Man. Only man can be absurd: for only man can be dignified.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: I knew exactly what to do on Alien, it was funny.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: When you're in the editing room, the dangerous thing is that it becomes like telling a joke again and again and again. Eventually, the joke starts to not be funny. So you have to be careful that you're not throwing the baby out with the bath water.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: You need to be silly to be funny.
author: William Shatner

quote: I used to stutter really badly. Everybody thinks it's funny. And it's not funny. It's not.
author: Joe Biden

quote: We'll love you just the way you are if you're perfect.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Parents are the last people on earth who ought to have children.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: As for our majority... one is enough.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Forty for you, sixty for me. And equal partners we will be.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: When I'm being funny, I try not to offend. I don't think much of what I've done has been in really ghastly taste. I don't think I have embarrassed many people or distressed them.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The tricky thing becomes: Do you know yourself well enough to then portray that on screen? And for me, I find that really hard. I'd rather hide behind accents and funny walks.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: From my perspective, probably women are won over by people who are sweet and respectful and courteous and kind and funny. I think those are the things that win women over.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I'm smart and I can be really funny and interesting and I can go toe-to-toe with anybody in a conversation.
author: Megan Fox

quote: I've always found it easier to be funny than to be serious.
author: Molly Ivins

quote: Who included me among the ranks of the human race?
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: The easiest time to be funny is during a fairly serious situation. That way, you can break the ice. It's crazy, but even at funerals, people will get huge laughs.
author: Adam McKay

quote: There's a funny thing about fame. The truth is you run as fast as you can towards it because it's everything you want. Not just the fame but what it represents, meaning work, meaning opportunity. And then you get there, and it's shocking how immediately you become enveloped in this world that is incredibly restricting.
author: George Clooney

quote: I never smoked. I never drank and I never took drugs. The funny thing is, nothing is more boring, people like this. For me, it's OK. But most of my friends, at least they smoke and drink.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: What's David's role? David looks good, that's what David does. David looks good, and I'm the funny one, that's what I hear constantly. But I keep telling him that looks fade.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: I like Ben Stein. I think he's funny, creative, and an insightful commentator on a host of issues.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: It may sound funny, but it's true: I tried to put myself through the 12-step program. I didn't want to attend a real meeting; my role didn't really require that, and I feel those meetings are sort of sacred, and they're anonymous for a reason. I tried to deal with some of my love of snacks - and I relapsed a lot.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: You have to discover when you're inadequate to be funny and you don't know you're inadequate when you're a kid.
author: Larry David

quote: Plus, I love comic writing. Nothing satisfies me more than finding a funny way to phrase something.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: I can't be funny if my feet don't feel right.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: It's funny, in a way the actor is a writer. It's not like the two things are so separate as to be like apples and oranges. The writer and the actor are one.
author: Sam Shepard

quote: To label me an intellectual is a misunderstanding of what that is.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: It's funny; recently I've started to notice people's impersonations of me, and it's basically like a hyperactive child.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: In my film 'Queen', there was a funny moment with the bra. My director called and said they are blurring the bra. They said it is vulgar. Our director was furious about it. We are artistes... We see props as they are. A woman's bra is not a danger to the society.
author: Kangana Ranaut

quote: I'm opening up my heart to the idea of dating. It's funny - my friends would always come to me for romantic advice. I know nothing, and things have changed since I was dating in high school! I'm really trying hard to spend this time working on myself.
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: All directors are control freaks and very obsessive. I get the feeling that directors as kids, they all have had a childhood with not too much contact with other kids. They constructed their own reality and they continue to do it. It's a funny breed, directors.
author: Stellan Skarsgard

quote: It's funny as I get older I'm reverting to my roots - I want to plant stuff.
author: Melissa McCarthy

quote: It's a weird thing. Rick Springfield wrote 'Jessie's Girl,' and he probably gets sick of talking about 'Jessie's Girl.' The thing is, I didn't write 'Blurred Lines.' I didn't direct the music video. I'm really happy for the success, but it is kind of a funny thing to follow me around.
author: Emily Ratajkowski

quote: I think a lot of stuff I find funny is from day dreaming.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I think since I was kid people told me that they thought I was funny.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I'm surrounded by friends and family who are not that impressed by celebrity. They don't have any problem telling me I'm acting like an idiot or I'm not that funny.
author: Paloma Faith

quote: I think it's funny to be delicate with subjects that are explosive.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I'm a pretty funny guy, and I would love to do a comedy with a bunch of funny guys - movie-star guys, where they could help me through it.
author: LeBron James

quote: What's funny is that the idea of popularity - even the use of the word 'popular' - is something that had been mostly absent from my life since junior high. In fact, the hallmark of life after junior high seemed to be the shedding of popularity as a central concern.
author: Susan Orlean

quote: The funny thing about directing is that you have your own opinions, but it's a collaboration. Directing is a group effort. Even though you might think something works, the smartest thing you can do as a director is try and weigh the opinions of the people around you.
author: Chris Evans

quote: It's funny how a chubby kid can just be having fun, and people call it entertainment!
author: Garth Brooks

quote: It's funny, but you get to a time in your life when you think you have all the friends you will ever have.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: It's funny because I think that both France and Britain are known for their distinctive styles, and everyone says that France is so chic and elegant but I think, more than that, French women are renowned for dressing in what suits them.
author: Alexa Chung

quote: If you imagine yourself to be someone who is very uncomfortable in their own skin, then it does funny things to your voice.
author: Rebecca Hall

quote: What's interesting about Laurel and Hardy is that in most comedy teams, there's a straight man, and then there's the funny guy. And with Laurel and Hardy, they're both the funny guy.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: People say funny things all the time during really serious moments in life.
author: Mark Ruffalo

quote: My sister and I - she's a musician - we jam all the time. We always play around for giggles with stuff that seem unconventional or stuff that seems funny. A lot of the stuff sometimes is just a response from jam sessions in her room, so she'll be on the guitar or the keyboard, and we'll just start singing and doing stuff.
author: Andra Day

quote: Before the Kennedys were elected, there had been older Presidents. Then here was this devastatingly attractive young couple with two beautiful children. They were so intelligent, graceful, gracious and funny. They enjoyed life so much. That's what caught America's eye.
author: Letitia Baldrige

quote: All my children inherited perfect pitch.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: Parrots make great pets. They have more personality than goldfish.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: I would love to do a movie with Albert Brooks; we're so different, but I find him so funny, and I can be just as seemingly narcissistic as he comes off, the 'it's all about me' kind of thing.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: It's funny when people say, 'I don't think Julia likes me.' Honey, if I don't like you, you're going to know about it.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: The follow your dreams thing is really important because so many people are railroaded into taking other paths by their family, their friends, people who should be supportive going, 'What are you talking about?' Even just seemingly regular career paths, but if it's not what people expect for you they kind of react funny.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I have a very low level of recognition, which is fine by me.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: The first day one is a guest, the second a burden, and the third a pest.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Do I like being thought of as attractive? I don't know anyone on Earth who doesn't, but I do find it funny.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: I find it very easy playing Bond. I think he's hilarious. He gets himself into some extraordinarily funny situations.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I mean, I - it's so funny, I am, you know, I am, you know, a working woman out in the world, but I still live with my parents half the time. I've been sort of taking this very long, stuttering period of moving out.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: I never thought of myself as like, a funny person.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: It is a scientific fact that your body will not absorb cholesterol if you take it from another person's plate.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Life's pretty funny when you're objectively on the outside looking at it.
author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: Have enough sense to know, ahead of time, when your skills will not extend to wallpapering.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Things can be funny when people are uneasy. It softens them up and stops them falling asleep on the sofa. I like those moments where people half-smile and half-wince.
author: Mark Haddon

quote: I look at old performance videos now, and it's really funny - I thought I was such a gangster!
author: Becky G

quote: One of the funny things in life to me is a guy who takes himself very seriously.
author: Dennis Farina

quote: Every man has his follies - and often they are the most interesting thing he has got.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Working for President Nixon was the most extraordinary professional experience of my life. He was endlessly fascinating: brilliant, visionary, kind, generous, warm, funny - and yes, a good man.
author: Monica Crowley

quote: I think our Batman had to be fun, light-hearted, funny, tongue-in-cheek... and I think that made kind of an homage to those earlier comic books, where Batman always had a quip or something.
author: Adam West

quote: I have the curse of thinking funny!
author: Adam West

quote: I'm an unorthodox type of guy, a funny guy - at least I think I'm funny. And one of the things I like to do is come up with nicknames for myself.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: It's funny because being comedic and happy and lighthearted is who I am as a person, so they're easier emotions for me to connect with.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: The guys on the stunt team are really fantastic. It's really funny, because for all the aggression they have to display on screen, they're actually really happy, good- natured people.
author: Miranda Otto

quote: It's funny when you're a kid how you can acclimate to almost anything.
author: Adam Carolla

quote: When I eventually met Mr. Right I had no idea that his first name was Always.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: When I was a little kid, I wrote this play about all these characters living in a haunted house. There was a witch who lived there, and a mummy. When they were all hassling him, this guy who bought the house - I can't believe I remember this - he said to them, 'Who's paying the mortgage on this haunted house?' I thought that was really funny.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I grew up in a funny way.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: It's painful for me to watch someone who isn't funny. It's horrifying to sit in the back and watch some guy who just totally sucks.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: I have this weird obsession with kids and old people falling. Like, funny falls. It is awful, but it's the thing that makes me laugh the most.
author: Malin Akerman

quote: I get called 'the girl off the dancing horse.' I just laugh; I think it's really funny. It's true, isn't it? It's great we're getting that recognition.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: I can speak Esperanto like a native.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Progress was all right. Only it went on too long.
author: James Thurber

quote: I don't hate humanity and I'm not interested in people who do. Although, it's funny, actually, some of my favorite writers really do. Like Martin Amis. My dirty secret. 'London Fields' is one of my favorite books ever. And it's indefensible! But he's so funny... I forgive him everything.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: To be thrown onto the stand-up stage is an experience that you cannot fathom until you're actually there, because there's no place to go, and everyone is looking at you and you can't even see them because of the lights. And yet you have to manage to start talking and be funny on top of it.
author: Garry Shandling

quote: But I think you can make fun of anything as long as it's funny enough.
author: Sarah Silverman

quote: I saw 28 Days. I don't remember rehab being like a day camp or being that funny. Rehab is a dumping ground. It's a big landfill.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: I've started looking at my own father a bit funny. He assures me, though, that I really am the son of a Scottish postman.
author: Craig Ferguson

quote: I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: I don't mean to sound - I don't want it to come out funny, but I don't like show business. I love - I love acting in films. I love it.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I read part of it all the way through.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: One man's folly is another man's wife.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Acting is all about big hair and funny props... All the great actors knew it. Olivier knew it, Brando knew it.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: One of the things I like about acting is that, in a funny way, I come back to myself.
author: Bill Murray

quote: It's funny because I'm a sucker for glitz and glitter when it comes to clothes and nail polish, but with my makeup, I'm more comfortable with a natural look. It feels more like me.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: As soon as I realized you could be funny as a job, that was the job I wanted.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: I'm like the master of ceremonies being funny, and then sometimes people you're with, girlfriends and stuff, are like, 'God I wish I had the person on stage to be with all the time.'
author: Artie Lange

quote: Sometimes when you write something on the page, it can seem very funny, but when you act it out - and this happens to me a lot, actually - the melancholy of the situation becomes more front and center.
author: Mike White

quote: Often, joking for me is a way of diffusing the awkwardness of a situation, so it's kind of exhilarating to be a part of projects where there's nothing funny or lighthearted.
author: Emma Stone

quote: I will say this about the truth - that it's one of those crisis rules, whether you are a client or someone who's living their life just every day - is that the truth has a funny way of not going away, and telling the truth is extremely important in dealing with any problem or crisis.
author: Judy Smith

quote: I joke around a lot about the manic times because they're funny. We manics do outrageous things and it is part of our colorful nature.
author: Patty Duke

quote: If love is the answer, could you please rephrase the question?
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Working with Chaplin was very amusing and strange. His films are so funny, but working with him, I found him to be a very serious man. Whereas the films of Hitchcock are macabre, he could be a very funny man to work with, always telling jokes and holding court. Of course, when I worked with Charlie he was getting older.
author: Tippi Hedren

quote: In a funny way, poems are suited to modern life. They're short, they're intense. Nobody has time to read a 700-page book. People read magazines, and a poem takes less time than an article.
author: Caroline Kennedy

quote: I'm sure that my parents' behavior has entered my work, I'm sorry to say. I don't think you need to have a difficult childhood to be funny, but it helps.
author: Roz Chast

quote: I do find comedy difficult. I don't know why. Maybe I think about it too much. There's a tremendous amount of pressure to be funny.
author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quote: As I get older, I just prefer to knit.
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: I think serial monogamy says it all.
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
author: Fred Allen

quote: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand.
author: Emo Philips

quote: I've always enjoyed making people laugh. But in order for me to be funny, I have to get ticked off about something.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Chris Hemsworth is like Christopher Reeve in that he can do two things: he can wear a big red cape without a shred of self-consciousness. But he's also funny as hell, and he's so sweet. So with all the fish-out-of-water stuff, he's so funny. So he does almost two jobs in a way.
