author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: I would call it a comedy variety show. We have some people just doing straight standup. We usually try to have one musical act of sort. So its just people being funny in different ways, not just sketch, not just standup, not just characters, all of those things.
author: Todd Barry

quote: I'm not one to sit here and judge here. But I think it's funny that the people that condemn the adult industry the most are the ones consuming the product the most.
author: Sasha Grey

quote: I'm somebody who believes in funny things, and laughing, but I do like for them to come from a place that addresses the human condition.
author: Natasha Lyonne

quote: You can't make everybody laugh. You gotta just do what you think is funny. Just be obstreperous to everybody.
author: Colin Quinn

quote: Whenever a film allows you to think and feel and take it beyond the moment, I think it's achieved something. And 'Funny Games' does that.
author: Naomi Watts

quote: I started writing when I was 9 years old. I was like this weird kid who would just stay in my room, typing little funny magazines and drawing comic strips.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: The magic in performing as an entertaining ventriloquist happens when the characters come to life and the interaction between the separate personalities on stage becomes 'real.' Then don't forget that the act has to be funny, and to me, being funny and entertaining any given audience is more important than anything.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: I've always said that instead of watching a guy juggle seven things amazingly I would rather see a really bad juggler who's really funny.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: I'm one of those hovering mothers and I know it's really important to have an independent child, so I'm trying to back off, but it's hard. I love him so much, and he's so funny and cute to me.
author: Selma Blair

quote: It's funny, but to me, when you go to a concert hall and hear electronic pieces from the '60s, I think they sound really dated. But when an orchestra plays a piece from that period, and it's going to sound different every time, it feels more modern to me.
author: Jonny Greenwood

quote: I'm good at coming up with wacky characters and funny dialogue.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: How can you analyse what is funny? What's funny to one isn't funny to another... What's funny to you is a personal thing.
author: Les Dawson

quote: I'm doing a pilot for Comedy Central with the band Steel Panther. They're faux heavy metal. They started as kind of a tribute band out here, or a cover band, and they're funny guys, and they just sort of morphed into their own thing.
author: Brian Posehn

quote: What you do with it and things like that, but I basically chose this after I read it because I thought it was different and funny and unique and dark - things that I like to do.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: I sang in the choir for years, even though my family belonged to another church.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: I wish I had the nerve not to tip.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: I don't know who the hell Paul Lynde is, or why he's funny, and I prefer it to be a mystery to me.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: I realized I was gay in the shower one day with Barbra Streisand. It happened while I was lathering, rinsing, and repeating with Pert Plus. As I was belting out the chorus to my favorite song from 'Funny Girl,' 'Oh my man, I love him so, he'll never know...' it hit me.
author: Ross Mathews

quote: It's funny, because I did all of these interviews as soon as I had the baby, and they were asking questions, and I really didn't have an idea of anything, because I was so blurry.
author: Emily Procter

quote: I've never gotten to do romantic comedy like most of the girls. Maybe because I'm fit, people assume that I'm not funny?
author: Jessica Biel

quote: Yes, I believe blue material is funny, but if that's all you've got, you're dead in the water. It's not good.
author: Howard Stern

quote: I grew up in Europe, where the history comes from.
author: Eddie Izzard

quote: I mean, sometimes... a comedian becomes an actor, and they just don't deliver, because the bottom line of comedy is to be funny, and the bottom line of acting is to be truthful, and they get that mixed up sometimes, or don't even notice that that's the thing.
author: Eddie Izzard

quote: It's a funny relationship that makeup artists have. I always feel kind of like a dentist. People look at me and think of pain.
author: Rick Baker

quote: Sometimes I am so dry that people don't know I'm kidding and think I'm being serious. I enjoy this because their reactions are often funny.
author: Robert Crais

quote: I don't have a bank account because I don't know my mother's maiden name.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm kidding about having only a few dollars. I might have a few dollars more.
author: James Brown

quote: There's something that's really fun about the challenge of making the mundane funny, too, I think.
author: Jim Gaffigan

quote: It all started when my dog began getting free roll over minutes.
author: Jay London

quote: I recorded my hair this morning, tonight I'm watching the highlights.
author: Jay London

quote: I realised that if you get yourself labeled as the funny one, people don't look any further. I've used that as I've got older. It's controlling: I decide what part of my personality you're seeing. I don't want you to look at me, I really don't. I don't want you to comment on my clothes, my hair or the way I look.
author: Catherine Tate

quote: You know, I'm just a very boring, not very funny person in person. I don't feel pressured to be otherwise.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: The best measure of a man's honesty isn't his income tax return. It's the zero adjust on his bathroom scale.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Also, in a funny way, if you have been happily married there are no unresolved areas, nothing to prove to yourself after the other dies.
author: Nigella Lawson

quote: I remember watching Gilda Radner when I was a kid and everyone thought she was so funny and no one ever said that she was a funny woman, she was just funny.
author: Rachel Dratch

quote: Jon Stewart hires people that he thinks are funny. That's it. That's the only requirement.
author: Olivia Munn

quote: They're great girls. They're very funny, they're very smart, they're fun to be with. They're very lively, as I think people can tell. And you know, they're very confident girls.
author: Laura Bush

quote: What's funny about the slacker thing, people project an image of what they think a musician is: young, slack, unemployed - like a really romantic idea of a poet, writer or musician - which isn't really true a lot of the time. I don't reckon you would know anything about me if I wasn't moderately hard-working.
author: Courtney Barnett

quote: It is to be observed that 'angling' is the name given to fishing by people who can't fish.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: It's so funny, because when I was growing up in a small town in New Hampshire, I was obsessed with Leonardo DiCaprio - from the 'Growing Pains'/'What's Eating Gilbert Grape' era, because he was superhot - and I carried a laminated photo of him in my wallet and said he was my boyfriend. But no one believed me.
author: Eliza Coupe

quote: 'Thunderbolts' I was mostly attracted to because I really wanted to write Punisher and Elektra and Deadpool, who are characters I have always really enjoyed. But the funny thing is that over time, I came to really like Red Leader; he became one of my favorite guys in the book. Sometimes characters surprise you.
author: Charles Soule

quote: And remember, it's also very funny, because side by side with grief lies joy.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: If you have a secret, people will sit a little bit closer.
author: Rob Corddry

quote: Communism is like one big phone company.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: I remember nearly having a fit of the giggles during the reading because dear Daniel was SO respectful and serious and I was finding the whole situation funny because I was speaking to his profile.
author: Madeleine Stowe

quote: It's funny, after a while, you get tired of having to fight someone because they don't like the way you look.
author: Chris Robinson

quote: I like to make jokes I consider myself a funny person. I just think making jokes about people who are in a situation beyond their control is not funny to them or their families.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: And at the time, it is funny how you can look at something and say, for example with my shoulder injury, when it first happened I said this is the worst thing that could happen to me. Why me, why now? Now I look back and say it was probably the best thing that happened to me.
author: Drew Brees

quote: What was really funny is that as I got older all those guys who called me a sissy in junior high school wanted me to be their best friend because they wanted to meet all the girls that I knew in figure skating.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Usually, if I think something is really funny, I'm not gonna test it. I'll just test it when I'm onstage.
author: Donald Glover

quote: It's so funny because I listen to songs that I recorded that I didn't really know anything about at the time. Later on I'm starting to feel the songs. Sing them first, feel them later.
author: Tanya Tucker

quote: Everybody's funny if you love them.
author: Anna Torv

quote: I like the hot-cold, the sugar-salt, being able to play over-the-top and dramatic things - in the same film. Just as in my life, I can be very funny and at other times almost extinguished.
author: Jean Dujardin

quote: Comedians don't laugh. They're too busy analyzing why it's funny or not.
author: James Lipton

quote: Whenever I'm in the U.K., people say I have an American accent. Which is, obviously, funny.
author: Zedd

quote: It's funny to think that when you get done with an acting job, you're considered unemployed. There are definitely times when those checks don't last forever. I went to college at a private school, and I racked up quite a bit of debt. I was very slow to pay them back.
author: Rami Malek

quote: Snoop Dogg is hilarious. T.I. is really funny. Who else? 50 Cent is hilarious. Jay-Z is funny. I've met him, but he's funny in interviews. He was funny when I saw him, too. Ludacris is funny. Everybody is. Rappers are funny, a lot of them.
author: Jay Pharoah

quote: I like to tell kids that I started thinking about stories when I first started reading stuff like Dr. Seuss and 'Go, Dog. Go!,' thinking, 'Oh yeah, that's funny. I'd like to do that.' And then writing throughout school, but at the same time I was studying pre-med stuff, because my mom told me I should be a doctor.
author: Jon Scieszka

quote: The way taxes are, you might as well marry for love.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: I really love showing up at work at 10 A.M., trying to make it funny until 3 P.M., and then going home. It's like comedy bankers' hours.
author: Chris Eigeman

quote: I live in a wonderful world of make-believe. A world of Ginger Rogers and Fred Astaire. A world of Winnie the Pooh and Edward Bear. Things like that. Wonderful things. Funny things.
author: Eileen Ford

quote: What does being a woman today mean? Is there a right way of doing it? Is there a wrong way of doing it? Different kinds of women, female friendships: It's all pretty funny, and worth making fun of.
author: Elizabeth Meriwether

quote: Whoever is my relative, I will not be nice to them.
author: George Lopez

quote: It's a funny business. I kind of compare it to baseball. I'm always looking for a home run.
author: Billy Mays

quote: For sheer sexiness, a man must be beautiful. Funny. yes. Clever, no.
author: Jilly Cooper

quote: I'd so much rather people think I was funny than pretty.
author: Kristen Johnston

quote: The heroines in 'That's What She Said' are flawed, messy, damaged, hilarious and culpable and not really concerned about being acceptable to the audience in any traditional sense, which for me is what makes them all the more gorgeous. And the fearless truth of that is what makes it funny.
author: Carrie Preston

quote: It's really irritating. Even people who like my work sometimes come up to me and say, 'I usually don't like female comedians, but your material is great!' It makes the job prospect more daunting. Funny is funny, you know?
author: Chelsea Peretti

quote: Someone told me that when they go to Vermont, they feel like they're home. I'm that way at Saks.
author: Caroline Rhea

quote: It's funny because I remember when I came to the U.S. with 'Swimming Pool,' the movie did well, and it was great box office for a French movie, but I remember I was a bit upset because all people talked to me about was the nudity.
author: Ludivine Sagnier

quote: But I believe that there are marriages where you can have your pool table and she can have her scrapbooking room or garden or whatever it is. But when everyone has what they want, it's not funny. There's no conflict.
author: Brad Garrett

quote: I own and operate a ferocious ego.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: I read a funny story about how the Republicans freed the slaves. The Republicans are the ones who created slavery by law in the 1600's. Abraham Lincoln freed the slaves and he was not a Republican.
author: Marion Barry

quote: Until you walk a mile in another man's moccasins you can't imagine the smell.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: The drawings in 'Portal' were actually me scribbling that stuff... I had a funny moment when I realized that someone gotten 'The cake is a lie' tattooed on themselves. It was really interesting to see my handwriting tattooed on another human being. That... that's odd.
author: Kim Swift

quote: My mother was a terrific force in my life. Wartime-generation woman, hadn't gone to university but should have done. Was very funny, very verbal, very clever, very witty.
author: Ian Hislop

quote: I'm too busy thinking what I'm going to say next to remember what I've said, but my staff tells me I'm sometimes funny. Not always on purpose, though.
author: Jared Polis

quote: I quit therapy because my analyst was trying to help me behind my back.
author: Richard Lewis

quote: When you're in love it's the most glorious two and a half days of your life.
author: Richard Lewis

quote: Dad was the first man I fell in love with. He was a very funny man. He grew up in the East End of London and was very dynamic, and I understood why my mother fell in love with him.
author: Patsy Kensit

quote: I can play a cat lady. I can't put my foot down and refuse to play anything but playing the perfect, well-adjusted woman, because those people aren't as fun or funny.
author: Sarah Baker

quote: My dad was in the army so we moved around a lot and I changed schools every year and had to make new friends, and I found that if I was the funny guy I could do that easier.
author: Jason Gann

quote: If the worst that happens is that I wake up and see a picture of myself and a headline saying, 'He wasn't very funny last night', then I've got nothing to complain about.
author: Matt Lucas

quote: I'm a misplaced American, but don't know where I was misplaced.
author: Ruby Wax

quote: When somebody listens and laughs, you're always in better shape than when you're with those folks who just kind of look at you when you say something funny. You wonder if they're looking at you because they're mad that they didn't say it or something. It's hard to handle that.
author: Jason Sudeikis

quote: I think it's great when dramatic actors do lighter, funny roles.
author: Noureen DeWulf

quote: When I have had a long day at work, I want something to watch that is funny, lighthearted and easy to get into, and reality is that. I'm not really into serious programmes or documentaries.
author: Amy Childs

quote: There's one thing about baldness, it's neat.
author: Don Herold

quote: It's funny, because I've never thought of myself as a Hispanic actor, like in 'American Gangster,' I'm playing an Italian. I've always been fortunate enough to have been allowed to play all these diverse roles.
author: Yul Vazquez

quote: I don't believe that anybody has come to a conclusion on why something is funny. It's funny because it's ridiculous and it's ridiculous for different reasons at different times.
author: Jackie Mason

quote: If at first you don't succeed, blame your parents.
author: Marcelene Cox

quote: Possibly I've become less funny as I've been happier.
author: Wendy Cope

quote: Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine.
author: Christopher Plummer

quote: My parents are both really, really funny, and my little sister is a really good painter, and my other sister is a really good writer.
author: Michael Cera

quote: Fencing is a funny sport. Competitive fencing is not really very applicable to the stage world unless you're fighting with a rapier during the Renaissance, you know?
author: Kris Holden-Ried

quote: Girls don't poop, so don't claim you do. You can fart - because farting is funny - but we don't want to know that you poop.
author: Ryan Hansen

quote: I've played a ghost, cat, snake. I've been funny, sad. I've been filmed flying on screen. So why not spend time on something else? I don't need to accept everything I'm offered.
author: Maggie Cheung

quote: It's funny how getting older - or being overlooked and underrated for more than two decades - can make you change your ambitions.
author: Reg E. Cathey

quote: I'm a classic example of all humorists - only funny when I'm working.
author: Peter Sellers

quote: We know that the nature of genius is to provide idiots with ideas twenty years later.
author: Louis Aragon

quote: When I was born I owed twelve dollars.
author: George S. Kaufman

quote: It's a funny thing, but today the Titanic is probably much more - that is people are much more aware of it than they were in 1954, when I was doing my research.
author: Walter Lord

quote: Porsche is a driver's car - a performance car. That was funny - here's this awesome car, but it's got no cup holders.
author: Jason McCoy

quote: I don't think I was funny until college. I lived with some Harvard MD/PhD students - they were so smart, and what I contributed to the house was, I was the funny one.
author: Wendy Liebman

quote: Violence is not funny.
author: William Friedkin

quote: I'm not a person who can spontaneously say funny things.
author: Ashley Williams

quote: It's kind of a funny way to put it, but if you want to study a dynamic economic system, what you'd like to be able to do is focus on the linkages, say, between asset markets and the macro economy without having to model everything at the same time.
author: Lars Peter Hansen

quote: It was Nick Willing's intention to make 'Hatter' as sarcastically British funny as he could.
author: Andrew-Lee Potts

quote: I really think that sex always looks kind of funny in a movie.
author: William Friedkin

quote: I don't get offered many dramatic roles. As soon as my face pops up in a movie, everyone knows I'm the funny guy.
author: Chris Elliott
